GK16visa10cu:18: tathāhi rasādyadhyavasāyapṛthakyatnanivarttyasya yamakāderekarūpānubandhanavato 'nuprasāsyāsamīkṣya viniveśitasya rūpakādeśca rasānupakāritvādalaṅkāratā /
GK16visa10cu:26: iti rūpakādeḥ samīkṣya niveśanaṃ ca tenaivoktam---
GK16visa10cu:33: muhuṛ kaṇṭhe laganaḥ taralayati bāṣpaḥ stanataṭaṃ priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe / na tu vayam” //
GK16visa10cu:49: vayaṃ priyā hitāḥ na bhavāmaḥ iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:50: atra patrālīmarddanavāyāpāreṇa saubhāgyahārī manyuḥ tava priyo jāta ityanena tvadanurodhakāriṇo vayaṃ tava hitā na bhavāma ityanena ca upālambho gamyate /
GK16visa10cu:56: mama tātapādānāṃ prabhāvatīpariṇaye prabhāvatīvarṇanaṃ yathā--- kalākulagṛhaṃ manaḥ--patagapañjaraṃ kāmināṃ vaśīkaraṇabheṣajaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:58: jagadvijayakarmaṇi smaramahībhujaḥ kārmaṇaṃ dṛśornigaḍabandhanaṃ trijagatāṃ paraṃ bhūṣaṇam //
GK16visa10cu:59: ityādau alaṅkāraṇāṃ nirvāhakarasasambandhākṣiptacetasaḥ kaverapṛthak-yatnanivarttyatvāt na doṣaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:61: yaduktaṃ dhvanikṛtā--- rasākṣiptatayā yasya bandhaḥ śakyakiyo bhavet /
GK16visa10cu:63: tathālaṅkārantaraṇi nirūpyamāṇadurghaṭanānyapi rasasamāhitacetasaḥ pratibhānavataḥ kaverahaṃpūrvikayā parāpatanti /
GK16visa10cu:70: “mitre kvāpi gate saroruhavane baddhānane tāmyati kandatsu bhramareṣu vīkṣya dayitā sannaṃ puraḥ sārasam /
GK16visa10cu:71: cakāhvena viyoginā bisalatā nāsvāditā nojjhitā kaṇṭhe kevalamargaleva nihitā jīvasya nirgacchataḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:72: ityatra coddīpanarūpāyā bisalatāyāḥ prayatnajīvaharaṇāvasānopakārakatvāt jīvananirodhārgalarūpotprekṣāyāṃ vipralambhaśṛṅgāratadābhāsayorananuguṇatvānnālaṅkāraḥ rasasyopakārakaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:74: tadeva suṣṭhūktaṃ śabdārthaśobhātiśayadvāreṇa rasāderupakārakā alaṅkārā iti /
GK16visa10cu:76: alaṅkārā asthirā iti naiṣāṃ guṇavadāvaśyarakī sthitiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:79: (vi, kha) naiṣāṃ guṇavaditi---mādhuryyādīnāṃ śṛṅgārādivyāpakatvāt tatra teṣāmavaśyasthiteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:84: yathā guṇā rasasya sthiradharmāstathā naite śabdārthayoḥ /
GK16visa10cu:85: evaṃ śabdārthayoranupacaritadharmatvenāsthiratvena śabdārthaśobhādhānadvāreṇa rasopakārakatvena ca guṇavyatiriktatvamalaṅkārāṇāṃ darśitam /
GK16visa10cu:87: śabdārthayoḥ prathamaṃ śabdasya buddhiviṣayatvācchabdālaṅkāreṣu vaktavyeṣu śabdārthālaṅkāsyāpi punaruktavadābhāsasya cirantanaiḥ śabdālaṅkāramadhye lakṣitatvātprathamaṃ tamevāha--
GK16visa10cu:90: (vi, ga) tatrādau punaruktavadābhāsasya śabdārthobhayālaṅkāratve śabdālaṅkāratayā kathanabījaṃ pradarśayaṃstamāha---śabdālaṅkārasyāpīti /
GK16visa10cu:119: tathā vyaktena śaśinaḥ śubhrāṃśunā śītaḥ śītalaḥ gaurvṛṣaḥ yasya tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:125: paryyavasāne tu śaśinaḥ śubhrā ujjvalā yeṃ'śavaḥ tadvat śītā gāvaḥ kāntayo yasya iti /
GK16visa10cu:133: paryavasāne tu bhujaṅgarūpaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ vidyate yasyetyādyanyārthatvam /
GK16visa10cu:169: tatra bhavān sadā anatyā paranatirāhityena bhātīti /
GK16visa10cu:174: (lo, ṝ) tṛtīyādau ca dānatyāgābhyāṃ saha varttate iti paunaruktyāvabhāsaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:190: tena “ke vāte sevayā deśe gehe ca lebhire yaśa“ityatra nānuprāsaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:200: (lo, ḷ) anuprāsa iti---svaravaiṣamye 'pi śabdasāmyamityatra śabdā vyañjanānyeva /
GK16visa10cu:202: tenaiṣā bālāyātītyādau svaramātrasya asakṛdāvṛttāvapi vyañjanavaisādṛśye cārutvābhāvasya sahṛdayasaṃvedyatvānnālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:204: kiñca svarasya vaiṣamye 'pi ityanena “kāverī vārī” tyāderetadavāhyatvam /
GK16visa10cu:207: darduradura ityādau prathamaduraśabdadakārasya mūrdhri rephalogānna yamakam /
GK16visa10cu:208: duradhyavasāya sāyamityādau cānusvārayogādanuprasā eva na yamakam /
GK16visa10cu:209: “ākarṇya karṇamadhurāṇī” tyādau ca prathamakarṇaśabdasya svataḥ svarāyoge 'pi dvitīyakarṇaśabdaniṣṭhasvabhāvāt svaravaiṣamyam /
GK16visa10cu:210: naitrānandena candreṇa māhendrī digalaṅkṛtetyādau nakārarapheyuktadakārayordūrāvasthānād anuprāsābhāvabuddhirna kāryyā,
GK16visa10cu:226: rasaḥ sara ityāde kramabhedena sādṛśyaṃ nāsyālaṅkārasya viṣayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:232: na caivaṃ varṇairānupūrvyācca sāmye 'nuprāsād yamakābhedaprasaktiriti vācyam;
GK16visa10cu:235: (lo, ai) rasa rasa ityatra rasayoḥ svarūpata eva sāmyaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:248: pāvanaḥ pavana iti vyañjanānāṃ bahūnāṃ sakṛdāvṛttiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:252: (vi, ḍa) varṇadvayasyāpi saṃghapadārthatvenātra vivakṣaṇattyoranekavarṇānāṃ cātra sakṛttvaṃ darśayati---atreti /
GK16visa10cu:255: evaṃ ca vṛttyanuprāsasyāpi vidagdhaprayojyatve 'pi tatra rūḍhyabhāvāt na chekapadaprayogaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:267: ekasya vyañjanasya sakṛdasakṛd vā sāmyamiti dvāviti caturddhā vṛttyanuprāsaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:285: svarasādṛśyasattve tu tasyāpi sammato yathā “dhūtacūtaprasūna” ityatra /
GK16visa10cu:289: nīyante pathikaiḥ kathaṃ kathamapi dhyānāvadhānakṣaṇa- prāptaprāṇasamāsamāgamarasollāsairamī vāsarāḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:293: “kākalī tu kalau sūkṣme dhvanau tu madhurā sphuṭe” ityamaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:312: samāsametyatra tu anekadhānekasya sakṛttvāccheka evetyatastanna darśitam /
GK16visa10cu:315: tadvatyāṃ vasturacanāyāṃ vastunor'thasya śabdena racanāyāṃ vṛttisaṃjñā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:321: yadyapi llāsairamī vāsarā ityatra ca sarayoranekadhā sāmyahetukena chekānuprāsenasahaikadhāsāmyabhedasya vṛttyanuprāsabhedasya ekavācakānupraveśarūpaḥ saṅkaro vakṣyate;
GK16visa10cu:327: tena nadvatī uktarītyā śṛṅgārādirasaupayikakomalaparuṣamadhyamavarṇārabdhā vāpi racanā vṛttirupacārāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:337: (lo, ā) uccāryyatvāditi--dvayorbahūnāṃ vā vyañjanānāṃ tālavyatvena dantyatvenādiśabdāt kaṇṭhyatvādinā sāmyaṃ śrutyanuprāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:338: imaṃ ca śrutyanuprāsaṃ “niveśayati vāgdevī kasyacit pratibhāvataḥ ';
GK16visa10cu:346: (vi, da) dṛśā dagdhamiti---virūpākṣasya jayinīstā vāmalocanā ahaṃ stuve /
GK16visa10cu:348: hareṇa manasijasya dṛśā dāhastābhistu kaṭākṣarūpayā dṛśā jīvanamato 'pi jayaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:362_1: vā ante uccaritastādṛśasvaraviśiṣṭāvasthaṃ vyañjanaṃ cedādyena svareṇa svapūrvabhūtasvareṇa
GK16visa10cu:364: yathā ekapādānte dhīraḥ anyapādānte vīraḥ iti,
GK16visa10cu:369: eṣa ca prāyeṇa pādasya padasya cānte prayojyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:377: prāyeṇa ityanena pajjhaṭikādicchandaḥ svevāsya sambhavo nānuṣṭhubādāviti darśatam /
GK16visa10cu:384: kāśapuṣpastabakavad dhavalaḥ keśaḥ prakaṭitasya vakrasya kubjasya karabhasya kariśāvakasyaiva vilāso yasya kāyastādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:385: tathāpi ceto 'nalpaṃ bahu kāmamabhilāṣaṃ na tyajatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:392: keśa ityatra yathāsambhavamiti vacanāt saṃyuktākṣararahito vikāśa ityatra śakāraḥ svaravisargayuktaḥ kakārasthitenā'kāreṇa saha /
GK16visa10cu:397: prāyeṇa iti vacanāt mama tātapadānāṃ lakṣbhīstave yathā---
GK16visa10cu:399: natiprītā pītāmbarasupariṇītāmaravadhū- dṛśā pītā sphītā malaruciparītā vijayatām” //
GK16visa10cu:401: asya ca prācīnoktālaṅkārebhyaḥ pṛthaganubhavasiddhaścamatkāraviśeṣa iti pṛthagalaṅkāratvam /
GK16visa10cu:425: (vi, ba) smerarājīveti---nāyaṃkaṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhānnimīlitākṣīṃ māninīṃ pratisakhyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:426: rūpeṇa kandarpanirjetāpi tvadanurāgāt tvadvaśagastathā cātra mānānaucityamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:427: atra ādye nayanakandarpapade uddeśyatātparyyake 'ntye tatpade tu vidheyatātparyyake ityato bhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:428: padārthau tu abhinnau mātrapadāt prakṛtyarthasya eva bhedavyāvṛttirna tu pratyayārthasya /
GK16visa10cu:430: atra vibhaktyarthasya paunaruktye 'pi mukhyatarasya prātipadikāṃśadyotyadharmirūpasya bhinnārthatvāllāṭānuprāsatvameva /
GK16visa10cu:437: tadvodhyasya dharmirūpasya nayanakandarpātmakasya arthasya prakṛtyarthānvitasvārthabodhakatvena asvatantrapratyayāpekṣayā svātantryād mukhyatarasyābhinnatvād ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:443: (vi, ma) yatra tu prakṛtyarthasyāpi bhedastatra na lāṭānuprāsatvamityāha---nayane iti /
GK16visa10cu:444: atra dvitīyanayanaśabdasya bhāgyavattādītyarthe tātparyāt tātparyyasyaiva prātipadikārthasyāpi bheda iti darśayati---atra hīti /
GK16visa10cu:445: tathā ca arthāntarasaṃkramitavācyalakṣaṇāviṣaya evāyaṃ na lāṭānuprāsa ityuktam /
GK16visa10cu:453: evaṃ supratipattaye 'sandigdhamudāharaṇaṃ darśayitvā sandigdhaṃ darśayati-nayane iti /
GK16visa10cu:456: na tu pratīyamāno viśeṣaḥ tasya gūḍhatvādiguṇībhāvahetutvābhāvāt /
GK16visa10cu:463: (vi, ya) asya ekapade iva anekapadeṣvapi sambhavaṃ darśayati---yathā vā /
GK16visa10cu:464: yasya teti---atra prathamārdhe davadahane tuhinadīdhititvaṃ vidheyamatāpakaratvāt /
GK16visa10cu:466: (lo, ū) eṣa ca bahupadaniṣṭho 'pi sambhavatīti tatrodāharaṇānyāha---yathā veti /
GK16visa10cu:467: yasya na savidhe dayitetyādau prathamārdhe tuhinadīdhitirdavadahanaḥ dvitīyārdhe davadahanaḥ tuhinadīdhitiriti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:488: arthe sati pṛthagarthāyāḥ padasaṃhateḥ tenaiva krameṇa āvṛttirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:490: tathā ca śamarate 'maratejasītyatra yamakitabāgayoḥ dvayoḥ “samarasamaraso 'ya” mityatra ekatarasya nirarthakatve pṛthagarthāyā ityuktyanaucityamaḥ ator'the satyuktamityāha /
GK16visa10cu:499: dvayorekatarasya vā arthāsattve tu svaravyañjanasaṃhateḥ tenaiva krameṇa āvṛttirityevameva lakṣaṇāntaramityabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:506: dvayorekasya vānarthakatve padatvābhāvāditi kvacid viṣaye sārthakatve svātantryeṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:511: “tenaiva krameṇa” iti damo moda ityāderviviktaviṣayatvaṃ sūcitam /
GK16visa10cu:516: pādādītyādipadāt pādasyaiva tṛtīyacaturthabhāgasya aniyatatadbhāgasya ca parigrahaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:525: kīdṛśaṃ navaṃ palāśaṃ patraṃ yasya tādṛśaṃ palāśavanaṃ kiṃśukakānanaṃ yatra tādṛśam /
GK16visa10cu:526: sphuṭaiḥ parāgaiḥ paragataṃ vyāptaṃ paṅkajaṃ yatra tādṛśam /
GK16visa10cu:527: mṛduto mṛdutaraḥ eva klāntor'thāt raviraśmanā latayā antaḥ agrabhāgo yatra tādṛśam /
GK16visa10cu:528: yadvā mṛdulaḥ mṛduḥ tāntaḥ arthāt yuvabhirākaṅkṣito latāyā anto agrabhāgo yatra tādṛśam /
GK16visa10cu:544: “palāśapalāśa” iti “surabhiṃ surabhiṃ” ityatra ca dvayoḥ sārthakatvam /
GK16visa10cu:550: (vi, sa) atra sārthakayoḥ palāśaṃ surabhimityanayoḥ padayoḥ dvayauḥ āvṛttiḥ ityāha---atreti /
GK16visa10cu:554: atra pādāvṛttiryathā mama tātapādānāṃ kuvalayāśvacarite munyāśramavarṇanam /
GK16visa10cu:559: “ekaṃ kūpe nayanamaparaṃ manmukhe khelayantī māmuddiśya pratikṛtimapi svāṃ kimapyālapantī /
GK16visa10cu:576: anyaḥ śleṣeṇa kākvā vā sā vakroktistato dvidhā // VisSd_10.9 //
GK16visa10cu:580_0: (vi, ka) vakroktyalaṅkāramāha---anyasya vakturanyārthakaṃ vākyam anyaḥ śrotā tadvākyaśleṣeṇa
GK16visa10cu:580_1: svavākyakākkā vānyābhiprāyakatayā yadi yojayed yojanaviśiṣṭaṃ pratyāyayet tadā sā
GK16visa10cu:587: svaraviśeṣeṇa vā yadi yathārthato 'nyārthatvena prayojyate sā vakroktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:591: “ke yūyaṃ sthala eva samprati vayaṃ praśno viśeṣāśrayaḥ kiṃ brūte vihagaḥ sa vā phaṇipatiryatrāsti supto hariḥ /
GK16visa10cu:592: vāmā yūyamaho viḍambarasikaḥ kadṛk smaro vartate yenāsmāsu vivekaśūnyamanasaḥ puṃsveva yoṣidrabhramaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:596: avijñātanāmajātikaṃ kañcit prati ayaṃ vaktuḥ praśraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:597: pṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaśca vidrāvakaḥ sa tadvākyaṃ tadvākyaśleṣeṇa ke jale yūyam ityabhiprāyakaṃ sthale evetyādi svottareṇa pratyāyayati /
GK16visa10cu:601: śeṣo 'nantanāgastadāśrayastaddvayoḥ praśra ityarthakatāṃ svottareṇa pratyāyayati---kiṃ vrūte iti /
GK16visa10cu:604: praṣṭā tat śrutvā krodhādāha---vāmā viparītabāddhṛtvena pratīkūlā yūyamiti /
GK16visa10cu:605: śrotā tu yūyaṃ vāmāḥ striyaḥ ityabhiprāyakatāṃ pratyāyayan taṃ nindati---aho viḍambeti /
GK16visa10cu:618: atra viśeṣapadasya “viḥ pakṣī” “śeṣo nāgaḥ” ityarthadvayayogyatvāt sabhaṅgaśleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:622: atra kayācitsakhyā niṣedhārthe niyukto nañ anyathā kākvā dūyata eveti vidhyarthe ghaṭitaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:626: krodhānnāyikayā parityaktasya kṛtāmaso nāyakasya āśvāsajanakasakhīṃ prati sakhyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:630: yadyapi tatprayuktaṃ vākyaṃ na śrutamasti yadantargataḥ nañ niṣedhārthaka. syāt /
GK16visa10cu:631: ato 'sya kāle ityādivākyasya kākkā yojanayā tadarthakavākyasyāsambhava eva,
GK16visa10cu:632: tathāpi prakaraṇādasya vākyasya nāyakaśvāsajanakavākyatvapratītau kākunañā eva tadupapattestadākṣiptavākyasthanañ eva svavākyasthanaño vidhyarthakatāghaṭanaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:642: tatra hi śocanābhiprāyakasya pūrvavākyasya kāmākulābhiprayakatvena dvitīyavaktryā yojanam /
GK16visa10cu:645: vākyaṃ yatra bhavetso 'yaṃ bhāṣāsama itīṣyate // VisSd_10.10 //
GK16visa10cu:657: bhāṣāsu samānyekarūpāṇi padāni vidyante yatreti vyutpattiyogādanvarthanām pṛthagalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:658: eṣa ca śleṣālaṅkāraviśeṣa iti yaduktaṃ caṇaḍīdāsapaṇḍitaistadasaṅgatam,
GK16visa10cu:668: he āli / mañjulamaṇimañjīre mañjulaṃ maṇiyuktaṃ mañjīraṃ yasyāḥ he tādṛśi /
GK16visa10cu:669: athavā mañjīre kalaśabdo gambhīro yatra tādṛśi /
GK16visa10cu:677: ityādau tu “sarasam” ityatra saṃskṛtaprākṛtayoḥ sāmye 'pi vākyagatatvābhāve vaicitryābhāvānnāyamalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:680: (vi, ca) sarvabhāṣāsu ekavidhaiḥ padaiḥ vākyaghaṭitatve evāyamalaṅkāraḥ tādṛśaikapadena tu vākyaghaṭane tādṛśasthale nāyamalaṅkāra ityāha---sarasaṃ kaiṇa iti /
GK16visa10cu:691: aneketyanena dvayorvā bahūnāṃ vārthānāmabhidhāne prakaraṇādiniyamābhāvādabhidhayā bodhane /
GK16visa10cu:699: “kāvyamārge svaro na gaṇyate” iti ca nayāt vācyabhedena bhinnairapi yugapaduccāraṇenāpagatabhedaiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:700: tridhā khalu śabdābhivyaktiḥ rūpator'thataḥ svarataśceti darśanāt /
GK16visa10cu:701: evaṃ ca bhinnayorapi samānaśrutyoḥ śabdayostattannyāyena uccaritayoḥ kameṇa svasyārthabodhanaṃ yatra tatra śabdasvarūpaśleṣeṇa śabdaśleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:702: śabdaparivṛttisahatve tvarthaśleṣa iti niyamamaṅgīkurvatāṃ kāvyaprakāśakārādīnāṃ matamanusṛtya vyākhyānam /
GK16visa10cu:703: anye tvāhuḥ--na khalu ghaṭapaṭayoriva “vasudhāmahita purājita nirāgamanābhāvāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:710: kiṃ ca yadyubhayārthapratipādanasamīhayā vakturekadā śabdadvayodāharaṇasambhavastadā ghaṭasahastracikīrṣuḥ kulālo 'pi ekadā tat nirvāhayet /
GK16visa10cu:712: tenaikatraiva śabde nānāviṣayāṇāmarthānāṃ svaṃsvasāmagrīvaśena kameṇojjīvanamiti vādināṃ matamevāśrayitumucitam /
GK16visa10cu:713: kintvatra mate tatprathamaviruddhāyā dvitīyābhidhāyāḥ punarujjīvanamanupapannamiti dvitīyābhidhānāmnā“janasthāne bhrānta” mityādāvivātrāpi vyañjanaiva vṛttirupadiśyate /
GK16visa10cu:714: evaṃ ca dhvanitantre prakaraṇaniyamasthale tasmādeva śabdāduccāraṇādisāmagrīsahakṛtā tadvyāpārantareṇa sabhaṅgābhaṅgaśabdāntaralabhyārthapratītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:715: yatra tu yena dhvastetyādau prakaraṇādiniyamo nāsti tatra dvayorabhidhānasaṃśayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:716: yatra ca śabdaparivartane 'pi dvyarthahānistatra śabdaśaktermūlatvena śabdaśleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:717: yatra ca śabdaparivarttane 'pi na tadarthakṣatistatrārthamātraṃ pratyevaṃśabdopayogādarthaśleṣatā /
GK16visa10cu:718: etanmatānusāreṇa tu śliṣṭāvarthau vidyete eṣviti matvarthoyapratyayāntatvena śliṣṭaiḥ padairityādi sautraṃ śliṣṭapadaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GK16visa10cu:721: asya sūtrasya śabdālaṅkāraprakaraṇe paṭhitatvādeva siddhaṃ padānāṃ parivṛttayasahatvam /
GK16visa10cu:722: ye tvāhuḥ “prati prasūte śabdaḥ śabdāntara“miti tadayuktaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:726: evaṃ ca varṇādigatatvena śleṣasya prācīnānurodhena vyavahāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:727: tathoccāraṇāṅgīkāre hi śabdayoḥ “durgālaṅghita” ityādau janasthāna ityādāvapi vyañjanānaṅgīkāraprasaṅgaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:728: “hṛdijñeṣu ca vakṣyati” ityādau “vyathāṃ dvayeṣāmapi medinībhṛtām“ityādau ca yasyārthasya prathamaṃ buddhyārohastasyopameyatā,
GK16visa10cu:742: (lo, i) iha ca varṇādigatatvena aṣṭavidhatvaṃ śleṣasyāsamīcīnamiti caṇḍīdāsapaṇḍitarāghavānandaprabhṛtīnāṃ matam /
GK16visa10cu:751: “yena dhvastamanobhavena” ityādau “syānnanditā virūpākṣapādapadmaniṣevaṇāt” ityādau ca prakaraṇājñāne kimahaṃ nanditānandakaḥ syāmiti kasyacid bhaktasya vacanam ?
GK16visa10cu:752: uta kasyacid bhaktasya nanditānandināmagaṇaviśeṣatvaṃ syāditi vacanamiti sandehaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:757: ityatra puṃnapuṃsakaliṅgayoḥ śatakoṭidatāmityatra dadāti-dyatyoḥ dhātvoḥ prakṛtyoścaśleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:759: “sarvasvaṃ hara sarvasva” ityatrāpi vakṣyamāṇodāharaṇer'thadvayasyāpi sandehāspadatvād vibhaktiśleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:760: “dadhate 'sya parāṃ śobhāmaho madhuratābhṛtaḥ” ityādau ca kiṃ madhuratāṃ bibhratīti madhuratābhṛto bahavo janāḥ,
GK16visa10cu:761: uta madhuratayā bhṛtaḥ kaścid varttata iti bahuvacanaikavacanayoḥ śleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:763: dadhata ityatrāpi ca pakṣe dhādhātorbahuvacanaṃ pakṣe ca dadhadhātorekavacanaṃ śliṣṭaṃ ca /
GK16visa10cu:764: tadevamabhidhādūyasaṃvedyapratyayoktitaḥ śleṣālaṅkāraviṣaye 'ṣṭavidhaśleṣasya sambhavamavicāryya prācīnādhikṣepakāribhirupajīvyaiḥ sahālaṃ bahunā vivādena /
GK16visa10cu:765: nanvevaṃ “yena dhvasta” ityādāvapi yasyārthasya prathamaṃ buddhyārohaḥ sa vācyo 'stu aparastu vyaṅgyo 'stu kiṃ tatrāpi śleṣālaṅkārakalpanairiti cennaivam /
GK16visa10cu:769: yattu caṇaḍīdāsapaṇḍitairuktaṃ “vyathāṃ dvayeṣāmapi medinībhṛtām” ityādau ubhayābhidhānaṃ cetīti “sandhyāvandanavelāyāṃ mukto 'hamiti manyate /
GK16visa10cu:775: “abalā acalā vā syuḥ“ityādau “āśīḥ paramparāṃvandyām” ityādau ca doṣasthale sandehavaśena vivakṣitaikārthānirddhāraṇādativyagratayā'svādaṃ prati prātikūlyam /
GK16visa10cu:777: ataeva pūrvatra mahākaveḥ skhalanamanyatra vahvarthapadanirvāhe prayuktasādhanaṃ sārvalaukikameva /
GK16visa10cu:782: evaṃ “vaurivaṃśadavānala” ityādau vaṃśaśabdāt vyañjanayā baudhitasya veṇurūpārthasyaikānvayarūpeṇārthena “gaurvāhīka';
GK16visa10cu:786: sa ca gavārtho mukhya iti tatra gauṇī lakṣaṇā /
GK16visa10cu:787: iha ca veṇurūpārtho vyaṅgya iti kathaṃ mukhyārthabādhajīvitā lakṣaṇeti cet ?
GK16visa10cu:789_0: yathā khalu “jātirekapadārtha” iti vādināṃ mate prācīnairasmābhiśca ihaiva dvitīyaparicchede
GK16visa10cu:789_1: saṅketitārthanirūpaṇe pradarśitena nayena jātimātrabodhanād abhidhāyāṃ viratāyāṃ
GK16visa10cu:789_2: vyaṅgyatvenābhyupagantavyayā vyakte rūpyamāṇānvayabodhe lakṣaṇā tathehāpi vyaṅgyatvenāha---tsaya
GK16visa10cu:810: vidhau vidhātari pratikūlatāmupagate bahusādhanatā bahūpāyatvaṃ viphalatvameti ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:812: patiṣyataḥ dinabharttuḥ avalambanāya rakṣaṇāya karasahastraṃ raśmisahastrameva karasahastraṃ hastahasastraṃ nābhūdityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:813: vidhau candre tasyaiva tatpratikūlatvānna tu vidhātuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:830: ubhayatraiva sarva iti kira iti ca /
GK16visa10cu:831: atra ca sarva ityatra pratyayaśleṣaṃ vinā vacanaśleṣa eva /
GK16visa10cu:833: ityatra tu vacanaśleṣaṃ vinā pratyayaśleṣa evetyataḥ pṛthak śleṣadvayam /
GK16visa10cu:835: artha ityanvaye tu ktapratyaye ubhayatra ekavacanam /
GK16visa10cu:837: (lo, u) sarva eva ityatra sarvaśabdo bahuvacanāntaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:839: tena sudhākiraḥ ityasya bahuvacanāntasya viśeṣaṇatve vikṣepārthāt kṛdhātoḥ kkipapratyayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:849: tanvyā vikasantī netranīlābje stanadvayī ca tava modaṃ sadā dattām /
GK16visa10cu:863: lasat taralahāriṇīti padaṃ netranīlābjaviśeṣaṇatve dvivacanāntaṃ stanadvayyāstvekavacanāntaṃ strīliṅgam /
GK16visa10cu:866: “ayaṃ sarvāṇi śāstrāṇi hṛdi jñeṣu ca vakṣyati /
GK16visa10cu:880: sāmardhyakṛt cāmitrasambandhitve chedanārthaḥ kṛntati iti dhātoḥ /
GK16visa10cu:882: vibhaktyabhede 'pi prakṛtimātrasya bhedāt prakṛtiśleṣa eva ityata āha--prakṛtyoriti /
GK16visa10cu:892: atra prakṛtiśleṣatvaṃ nirasyati atra padabhaṅge iti /
GK16visa10cu:894: yadyapi nyūnādhiketyādilakṣaṇavaśādeva prakṛtiśleṣato bhedasiddhistathāpi prakārāntareṇāpi tatsiddhirdarśitā /
GK16visa10cu:902: iha tu vibhakteḥ pṛthvādiśabdeṣu pṛthukādiśabdeṣu ca bhinnatayā padadoṣa eva /
GK16visa10cu:915: tathā ca vanevṛddhānāṃ vṛddhamṛgaṇāṃ kamalānāṃ ca sadṛśe tasyā locane /
GK16visa10cu:917: bhūriśilīmukheranekabāṇaiḥ karaṇabhūtaiḥ lubdhakairvyādhaiḥ karttṛbharākulībhāvaṃ nītā vanavṛddhāḥ mṛgāḥ,
GK16visa10cu:918: lubdhairmadhulubdhairbhūriśilīmukhairanekamadhukarairākulībhāvaṃ nītāni vane jale vṛddhāni kamalāni ca /
GK16visa10cu:938: śivabhaktastaṃ prati dasyośca putrādikaṃ prati coktiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:941: nayasya nīteḥ upakārantarasya sāmmukhyaṃ sambhavo yasmāt tādṛśaṃ tanuvarttanaṃ śarīrasthitam āyāsi agacchasi prāproṣīti yāvat /
GK16visa10cu:952: āyāsi āyāsayuktaṃ tanordehasya varttanaṃ vṛttimupakārasāmmukhyaṃ naya prāpaya /
GK16visa10cu:956: upakārāt sāmmukhyaṃ naya upakāraṃ mā kurviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:957: varttanaṃ vṛttim āyāsi āyāsayuktaṃ tanu vistāraya /
GK16visa10cu:962: asya ca bhedasya pratyayaśleṣeṇāpi gatārthatve pratyayāntarāsādhyasubantatiṅantagatatvena vicchittiviśeṣāśrayaṇātpṛthaguktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:965: (vi, ta) atra āyāsi iti vinā sarvatra luptasuptiṅantatve 'pi āyāsi ityatra luptāluptadvayāntatve 'pi ca padayoraikarūpyaṃ darśayati---atra ceti /
GK16visa10cu:968: svatulyatvena pratyayāntaram asādhyam abodhyaṃ yayoḥ tādṛśau yau suptiṅau tadantargatatvenāsya śleṣasya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:974: hara bahusaraṇaṃ taṃ cittamāhemavasara ume sahasā” //
GK16visa10cu:980: āgamasya vedasya āharaṇe vaśīkaraṇe me mama taṃ prasiddhaṃ samāsaṅgam ava rakṣa /
GK16visa10cu:982: samāsaṅgaṃ kīdṛśaṃ surasandhaṃ surāṇāṃ sandhaṃ sambandhikārakaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:984: tathā taṃ prasiddhaṃ cittamoham avasare 'parthānmaraṇarūpe sahasā hara nāśayaḥ kīdṛśaṃ cittamohaṃ bahusaraṇaṃ nānāvidhakāryyaviṣayam /
GK16visa10cu:986: prākṛtapakṣe--- mama dehi rasaṃ dharmeṃ tamovaśāmāśāṃ gamāgamād hara naḥ /
GK16visa10cu:987: haravadhu śaraṇaṃ tvaṃ cittamoho 'pasaratu me sahasā //
GK16visa10cu:999: me mama āgamāharaṇe āgamānāmākalane taṃ samāsaṅgam āsaktim ava sthirīkurviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1001: āgamādhyāsasya svargahetutvād bahu bahulaṃ saraṇaṃ prasāro yasya evaṃbhūtaṃ cittamohaṃ manoniṣṭham ajñānam,
GK16visa10cu:1007: “mahyaṃ dehi rasaṃ dharme tamovaśāmāśaṃ gamāgamādvara naḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1008: haravadhu / śaraṇaṃ tvaṃ cittamoho 'pasaratu me sahasā” //
GK16visa10cu:1009: gamāgamo vidyate yatra tasmāt mamāgamāt saṃsārādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1016: apratimānaṃ kṣamate sa gaṇikānāṃ na rañjayitum //
GK16visa10cu:1029: (lo, au) evaṃ varṇādigatatvenāṣṭavidhaṃ śleṣamuktvā punaḥ prakārāntareṇa trividhamāhṛ---punariti /
GK16visa10cu:1046: “yena dhvastamanobhavena balijitkāyaḥ purāstrīkṛto yaścodvṛttabhujaṅgahāravalayo gaṅgāṃ ca yo 'dhārayat /
GK16visa10cu:1047: yasyāhuḥ śaśimacchirohara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarā /
GK16visa10cu:1055: tvāṃ sarvadā sa umādhavaḥ sarvado mādhavaśca pāyāt /
GK16visa10cu:1057: abhavena anutpattinā yena anaḥ śakaṭaṃ dhvastaṃ nityaśarīrasya tasyaṃ rūpāntareṇāvirbhāvamātraṃ,
GK16visa10cu:1063: yaśca udvṛttasya durvṛttasya bhujaṅgasya aghāsurasya hantā /
GK16visa10cu:1064: ravasya nānātmakabrahmaṇo layo līnatā yatra tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1066: kūrmavarāhamūrttyā ca gāṃ pṛthivīṃ ca yo 'dhārayat /
GK16visa10cu:1067: śaśimathaḥ rāhoḥ śirohara iti stutyaṃ nāma yasyāmarā āhuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1070: umādhavapakṣe---dhvastamanobhavena dhvasto dalito manobhavo kāmo yasmāt /
GK16visa10cu:1071: yena balijito viṣṇoḥ kāyaḥ purasya tripurāsurasya nāśakāstrīkṛtaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:1073: yaścodvṛttabhujaṅgarūpo hāraḥ valayaśca kaṅkaṇaḥ yasya tādṛśaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:1076: hara iti stutyaṃ nāma cāmarā āhuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1084: udvṛttā ativarttulākārā bhujaṅgā eva hārā valayāśca yasya /
GK16visa10cu:1091: ātmana eva kāyaḥ purā pūrvam amṛtāharaṇakāle 'suramohanārthaṃ strīrūpaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1092: udvṛttaḥ uddhato bhujaṅgaḥ kāliyaḥ taṃ hantīti /
GK16visa10cu:1094: agaṃ parvataṃ govarddhanākhyaṃ gāṃ pṛthvīṃ ca /
GK16visa10cu:1095: śasinaṃ mathnāti iti śaśimadrāhuḥ tasya śiroharaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1096: andhakānām andhakavaṃśīyānāṃ kṣayo nivāso dvārakāpurasambhandhī tatkaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1116: yathā-- “sārasavattā vihatā na bakā vilasanti carati no kaṅkaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1118: iti atra hi rājapakṣe sā, iti, kam iti /
GK16visa10cu:1119: saraḥ pakṣe netītyatra tu sā nāsti /
GK16visa10cu:1121: yathā kāṣṭhayorbhinnayorapyupāyavaśena jaḍīkṛtayorekatā tathābhinnayoḥ padayoḥ śabdayorekatra varṇavyūhe sanniveśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1128: yathā ekasminneva vṛnte phaladvayaṃ tathā ekasminneva śabder'thadvayasaṃsargaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1130: yo hi yadāśritaḥ sa tadalaṅkāra eva /
GK16visa10cu:1137: kevalaṃ vibhinnatvena pratīyamānayorapi atyantasannidhānarūpa eva jatukāṣṭhayoriva śleṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1141: tāvataiva kathamarthālaṅkāratvam ityatrāha---yo hi yadāśraya iti /
GK16visa10cu:1146: yathā loke bhujāśrito bhujasthālaṅkāraḥ kaṇṭhaśritaḥ kaṇṭhasya tathāsau śabdāśrita iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1153: tathāhi--atra dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyadoṣaguṇālaṅkārāṇāṃ śabdārthagatatvena vyavasthiteranvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvena niyam iti /
GK16visa10cu:1160: arthaśaktimūlatve tu arthagatatvena doṣādīnāṃ tu śabdārthanvayādyavidhānaṃ sphuṭameva /
GK16visa10cu:1161: tathā ca nānārthābhaṅgaśabdasyāpi śleṣeṇānvayavyatirekānuvidhānāta tatrāpi śabdaśleṣatvameva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1166: atra alaṅkāraprastāve yeṣāṃ dvandvārthānāṃ śabdānāṃ paryyāntareṇa pratipādane 'pi na kṣatista evārthagatāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1167: yeṣāṃna tu tathā te śabdagatā eveti niyamanāt prācīnairalaṅkārakārairiti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1173: (vi, pha) mataviśeṣe tu yatra nānārthasthale 'pi śabdabhedastathā ca tatrāpi śliṣṭānekaśabdakṛtaḥ śabdālaṅkārastanmate nirbādha eveti tanmataṃ darśayati---na cāndhaka iti /
GK16visa10cu:1178: na ca tatkathaṃ nānārthakaśabdāḥ śrūyante iti vācyam--ekaprayatnoccāryyatvadoṣeṇa bhedāgrahāt /
GK16visa10cu:1186: visadṛśaśabdadvayasya bandhe cevaṃvidhasya vaicitryābhāvād vaicitryasyaiva cālaṅkāratvāt /
GK16visa10cu:1190: (vi, ba) nanu sabhaṅgaśleṣasthaler'thabhedāt tvadabhimatasvarabhedadṛṣṭāntena abhaṅgānekaśabdānāmarthabhedāt svarabheda eva syāt /
GK16visa10cu:1191: tathā ca svarabhedavailakṣaṇyagrahe kathaṃ bhedagrahaḥ syādator'thabhedasya śabdabhedavyāptiraprayojikaiva ityata ekaprayatnena nānāśabdoccāraṇamityata āha---kiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:1193: nanu andhakādyakhaṇḍaśabdasya mukhyatve kiṃ pramāṇamityata āhavisadṛśaśabdadvayasyeti /
GK16visa10cu:1194: nahi hariṇaśabdasthale tadarthakendrādiśabdaprayoge hari naumītyatreva viṣṇivandrau naumītyatrāpi śleṣarūpavaicitryānanubhava ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1201: (lo, ṛ) ye 'pyāhuryo yadāśretaḥ sa tadalaṅkāra iti tanmate 'pyatra vaucitryasya śabdaniṣṭhatvācchabdālaṅkāratvamityāha---kiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:1212: rasādirūpasyārthasya tadabhivayañjakasya vibhāvādirūpasyārthasya vānusandhānamastyeveti tepi kathaṃ śabdālaṅkāramadhye yuṣmābhirapi gaṇyanta iti /
GK16visa10cu:1214: śabdasyābhinnaprayatnoccāryatvenārthālaṅkāratve “pratikūlatāmupagate hi vidhau” ityādau śabdabhede 'pyarthālaṅkāratvaṃ tathāpi prasajyata ityubhayatrāpi śabdālaṅkāratvameva /
GK16visa10cu:1217: (vi, bha) abhinnaprayatnoccāryyatvenārthālaṅkāratvasya taduktasya śabdālaṅkāratayā nirvivāde varṇaśleṣavarṇānuprāse 'pi atiprasāktimāha---pratikūlaṃtamiti /
GK16visa10cu:1225: yatra tu śabdaparivarttane 'pi na śleṣatvakhaṇḍanā, tatra--
GK16visa10cu:1233: aho tulāyā mānatulāyāḥ koṭeragrabhāgasya khalasya ca susadṛśī vṛttiryataḥ stokenetyādi /
GK16visa10cu:1238: (lo, ḷ) tat kva nu punararthaśleṣa ityāha---yatra hīti /
GK16visa10cu:1246_0: (vi, ya) idānīṃ śleṣasya alaṅkārāntarāsaṅkīrṇaviṣayābhāvād alaṅkārāntarasya ca śleṣāsaṅkīrṇaviṣayasattvāt
GK16visa10cu:1246_1: sāmānyamalaṅkārāntaramapavādatvena bādhitvā śleṣa evālaṅkāraḥ alaṅkārāntaraṃ tu tat
GK16visa10cu:1249: alaṅkārāntaraviṣayiṇī pratibhā tasyā evotpattihetutvamasya śleṣasya tadviṣayabodhakatvamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1254: (lo, e) eṣa ca niyamādalaṅkāraṇāṃ vicchittimādāyaiva sambhavatītyetadviṣaye vidyamānānāmalaṅkāraṇāṃ bādha iti ye manyante teṣāṃ pakṣamupanyasya dūṣayati--asya ceti /
GK16visa10cu:1257: teṣāmalaṅkāraṇāṃ bādhakatvādavakāśāntarābhāvena tahyapadeśaṃ bādhitvā mukhyatvena vyapadeṣṭuṃ yogyatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:1264: (vi, ra) tanmate 'pi sakalālaṅkārasaṃkare śleṣo na bādakaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:1266: tatra samāsoktyaprastutapraśaṃsāsaṅkīrṇasya śleṣasya taddvayabādhakaprasaktireva nāsti ityāha---samāsektīti /
GK16visa10cu:1274: yathā--- “satataṃ yā madhyasthā kathayati yaṣṭiḥ pratiṣṭitāsīti /
GK16visa10cu:1284: (lo, ai) itthamiti vakṣyamāṇasya buddhisthitayāṃ idamā parāmarśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1289: yathā samastaṃ timirāṃśukaṃ tayā puro 'pi rāgād galitaṃ na lakṣitam” //
GK16visa10cu:1298: anabhidheyatayā abhidhāyāḥ prakṛtabodhanena viramād asya śleṣasya /
GK16visa10cu:1300: “vidvanmānasahaṃsa--” ityādau śleṣagarbhe rūpake 'pi mānasaśabdasya cittasarorūpobhayārthatve 'pi rūpakeṇa śleṣo bādhyate /
GK16visa10cu:1306: viduṣāṃ mana eva mānasaṃ sarastatra haṃseti rājñaḥ sambodhanam /
GK16visa10cu:1311: yathā “pṛthukārttasvarapātram” ityatra sadanadvayaviśeṣaṇayoḥ śliṣṭārthayoḥ viśrāntistadāha---śleṣe hīti /
GK16visa10cu:1316: ataevātra “rājanārāyaṇaṃ lakṣmīḥ samāliṅgati nirbharam” ityatra rājño nārāyaṇatvocitalakṣmīsamāliṅganaṃ varṇyate /
GK16visa10cu:1317: tathā “mukhacandra prakāśate” ityatra mukhaṃ candrarūpatāmāpadyata ityuparacitacandradharmasya tatra varṇanam /
GK16visa10cu:1318: samakakṣatvaṃ na khalu rūpakavad ekasya gauṇatānyasya prādhānyam /
GK16visa10cu:1320: yathā---“hṛdijñeṣu vakṣyati” ityādau vahanavacanayoḥ tathā “pṛthukārtasvara” ityādau pṛthukādīnām /
GK16visa10cu:1322: “sannihitabālāndhakārā bhāsvanmūrtiśca” ityādau virodhābhāse 'pi viruddhārthasya pratibhātamātrasya prarohābhāvānna śleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1332_1: iti bādhasyāpi upasthitimātreṇa eva virodhābhāsālaṅkāratā śleṣasya tu śliṣṭārthasyānvaye
GK16visa10cu:1336: bhāsvataḥ kāntimato 'pīvā sūryyamūrttau andhakārasya sannidhānābhāvād virodhābhāsaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1342: (vi, śa) evaṃ punarurakteti---na hi bhujaṅgakuṇḍaliśabdayoḥ ekārthatvabodhaḥ paryntikaḥ;
GK16visa10cu:1349: (vi, ṣa) itthamuktasthaleṣu śleṣālaṅkāraṃ bādhitvā te te alaṅkārā evetyuktvā alaṅkārāntarasyaiva bādhakaḥ śleṣa iti tadabhipretaṃ vaktumāha---yena dhvastamiti /
GK16visa10cu:1351: svecchopajātetyādau dapike sakalakalamityādau copamāyāṃ vidyamānāyāmapi śleṣeṇaiva vyapadeśo bhavituṃ yukta ityagre 'nvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1352: tena yena dhvastamityādau mādhavomādhavayordvayorapi prākaraṇikayoḥ yena dhvastetyādyekadharmānvayarūpastulyayogitālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1357: nītānāmityādau tu aprākaraṇikayoreva vanavṛddharakamalayoḥ nītānīmityādi pūrvārddhekte karmānvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1363: “svecchopajātaviṣayo 'pi na yāti vaktuṃ dehīti mārgaṇaśataiśca dadāti duḥkham /
GK16visa10cu:1371: prasūnaviśikho 'lpabuddhiḥ prabhuśca svecchopajātaviṣayo 'pi svecchayā sarvalokopari prāptādhikāro 'pi dehīti vacanaṃ na yāti na prāptoti /
GK16visa10cu:1373: tathāpi mārgaṇaśataiḥ asaṃkhyabāṇaiḥ duḥ khaṃ dadāti /
GK16visa10cu:1374: uktarūpaḥ prabhustu lokeṣu dehīti dadasveti vacanaṃ na yāti na prāptoti /
GK16visa10cu:1376: mārgaṇaśataiḥ paradhanānveṣaṇarūpamārgaṇaśataiḥ arthāt īdṛśapadātiśataiḥ duḥ khaṃ dadāti /
GK16visa10cu:1377: dehītyanuktvāpi padatidvārā sarvasaṃva hṛtvā duḥ khaṃ dadātītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1378: adhikārasattvāddehītyuktvāpi sarvasvaṃ grahītuṃ sāmarthyasattve 'pi alpabuddhitvāttathā na karotītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1379: evaṃ prasūnaviśikhaḥ svadattamohād akāṇḍe 'kasmājjīvanamapi samākṣipati harati ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1380: atra prākaraṇi ka uktarūpaḥ prabhuraprākaraṇikaḥ prasūnaviśikhaḥ;
GK16visa10cu:1386: svecchayā upajāta āśritaḥ viṣayaḥ bhogaḥ yasya /
GK16visa10cu:1387: vaktuṃ na yātīti na tatra svārthanivedanaṃ vaktuṃ śakya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1389: iti mārgaṇaśataiḥ yācanaśataiḥ pradānābhāvāt punaḥ punaḥ kṛtaiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1395: vaktuṃ na yātīdṛśaḥ samprati me kāma iti /
GK16visa10cu:1402_0: ityādau copamāyāṃ vidyamānāyāmapi śleṣasyaitadviṣayaparihāreṇāsaṃbhavād eṣāṃ ca śaleṣaviṣayaparihāreṇāpi
GK16visa10cu:1402_1: sthiteretadviṣaye śleṣasya prādhānyena camatkāritvapratīteśca śleṣeṇaiva vyapadeśo bhavituṃ yuktaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:1407: tatra parasparavyabhicārasattvena dvayorapyalaṅkāratvaṃ draḍhayannubhayasattveṣu viṣayeṣu śleṣasyaivaucityamityāha---śleṣasyaitad ityādi /
GK16visa10cu:1408: pratikūlatāmupagate hi vidhau ityādiṣu etadviṣayaparihāreṇa śleṣasya śleṣarahitatulyayogitādīpakopamānāntu śleṣaparihāreṇa sthitirbahuṣvevodāharaṇeṣu draṣṭavyā /
GK16visa10cu:1420: eṣāṃ tulyayogitādīnāṃ trayāṇāmalaṅkāraṇāṃ prābalyena camatkāritvaṃ kavinā vdyarthaśabdasya vaicitryabodhopāyatvenopādānāt /
GK16visa10cu:1425: atra ca mādhavomādhavayorekasya vācyatvaniyame parasya vyaṅgyatvaṃ syāt /
GK16visa10cu:1432: śabdayostantratāṅgīkāreṇa dvayorvācaytvaniyamaḥ samanantaroktaprakāreṇa dhvanitantravādimate caikasya vācyatvamitarasya vyaṅgyatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1447: atra yena dhvastamityādau iti samīcīnaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1455_0: tathā ca vaktrā yadyekamevārthaṃ prakramyedaṃ padyamuktaṃ syāttadānyārthasya vyaṅgyatvena
GK16visa10cu:1455_1: tulyayogitāyā atra prasaktyabhāvenāyameva tulyayogitālaṅkāraviviktaḥ śleṣasya viṣayaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1456: naca tathāpi vyaṅgyopamālaṅkārasaṅkīrṇa evāyaṃ śleṣa iti vācyam,
GK16visa10cu:1457_1: kevalaṃ tatrālaṅkāravyapadeśo brāhmaṇaśramaṇanyāyena vācyatādaśāyāmalaṅkāratvamādāya gauṇa eva /
GK16visa10cu:1459: nanu mādhavomādhavayoḥ dvayārapi tulyavibhaktiviṣayatvena prākarāṇakatvamevetyato dvayārvācyatvenātra tulyayogitaivetyata āha---kiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:1468: evaṃ ca yena dhvastetyādau nītānāmityādau ca yattulyayogitā---pradarśanaṃ prākkṛtaṃtatparakīyamapapradarśanamātraṃ kṛtamiti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:1469: vastutastu taddvaye śleṣa eva tulyayogitārahita iti sādhitaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:1474: pracakame pallavarāgatāmrā prabhā pataṅgasya muneśca dhenuḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:1475: ityādau tulyayogitāyāmekasyaiva nilayagamanopakramarūpadharmasya saurabhīprabhayordharmiṇoḥ sambaddhatayā pratyayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1476: iha tu śleṣeṣu punaranekeṣāṃ dharmiṇāṃ mādhavomādhavaprabhṛtīnāṃ yena dhvastamanobhavenetyādirūpapṛthagdharmasambaddhatayā pratyaya ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1481: yadyapi tulyayogitāyāmapi dvayorna prakṛtāprakṛtatvaṃ tathāpi tad vivakṣā,
GK16visa10cu:1485: pūrṇopamāyā nirviṣayatvāpatteḥ “kamalamiva mukhaṃ manojñametat” ityādyasti pūrṇopamāyā viṣaya iti cet ?
GK16visa10cu:1486: na, yadi “sakala-” ityādau śabdaśleṣatayā nopamā tatkimaparāddhaṃ “manojñam” ityādāvarthaśleṣeṇa /
GK16visa10cu:1492_0: (vi, kha) tathā sakalakalamityādau ca yadupamāyāṃ vidyamānāyāmapi apavādatvena śleṣasyaiva
GK16visa10cu:1492_1: prādhānyena vyapadeśo bhavituṃ yukta ityuktaṃ tatropamaivālaṅkāro na śleṣa iti pratipādayati---sakalakalamityādau ceti /
GK16visa10cu:1499: atra śleṣa eva tvalaṅkāra iti netyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1500: tathā ca śliṣṭadharmasādharmyā upamā evālaṅkāra ityuktamanena /
GK16visa10cu:1502: upamānopameya sādhāraṇadharme vādicaturṇām upādāne hi pūrṇopamā /
GK16visa10cu:1509: tadvān viṣaya eva pūrṇopamāyā viṣayaḥ syādityāśaṅkate---kamalamiveti /
GK16visa10cu:1510: atra hi na śleṣo manojñatvaguṇakathanarūpakriyayoreva sādharmyād na tu śliṣṭaśabdasya iti /
GK16visa10cu:1513_0: yadi sakalakalamityatropamāṃ bādhitvā śleṣa eva śabdālaṅkārastadā kamalamiva mukhamityādāvapyupamāṃ
GK16visa10cu:1513_1: bādhitvā arthaśleṣālaṅkāre prasajati tena kimaparāddhaṃ manojñatvādidharmāṇāmubhayatrānvayarūpaśliṣṭatvaditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1514: ivaśabdasadbhāvādupamāyā eva tatrānubhavikatve tu sakalakalamityādāvapi śabdasādharmyodanubhūyamānopamaivetyabhiprāyeṇātra rudraṭoktamapi pramāṇayati---sphuṭamartheti /
GK16visa10cu:1516: hṛdaye ca me” ityatra śabdāsādharmyāt samuccayālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1520: pūrṇopamāprakaraṇe lakṣyamāṇārthaśleṣeṇa kamala mivetyādau manojñatvadharmasya kamalamukharūpapratisambandhibhedāṅgīkāraprayojitena kimaparāddham /
GK16visa10cu:1521: tulyenāparādhena śabdaśleṣaviṣaye pūrṇopamāmanaṅgīkṛtya etad viṣaye kiṃ tasyāḥ parigraho 'bhimato yuṣmākaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:1528: kriyāsāmyaṃ candra iva mukhaṃ śobhate ityādi /
GK16visa10cu:1534: tataśca pūrṇopamāyā anyathānupapattyā guṇakriyāsāmyasyaivārthaśleṣaviṣayatayāḥ parityāge pūrṇopamāviṣayatā yuktā,
GK16visa10cu:1543: na tu sakalakalamityādau śabdasādharmyasya ityatra upamāprayojakatvamityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1545: śabdasya sādharmyaṃ ca vācakatāsambandhena iti yadvṛttitvāditibhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1547: (lo, ṛ) tatra guṇakriyāsāmye vāstavatvāt svābhāvikatvāt avāstavatvāt atāttvikatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:1552: tadā kathaṃ “vidvanmānasa--” ityādāvādhārabhūte cittādau sarovarādyāropo rājādehasādyāhopaprayojakaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1555_0: (vi, gha) yadi hi vācakatāsambandhasya vṛttiniyāmakatvābhāvena śabdarūpasādharmyasya
GK16visa10cu:1555_1: avāstavatvānnālaṅkāraprayojakatvaṃ tadā paramparitarūpake eva śabdavācyatvena sāmyena
GK16visa10cu:1558: ayamarthaḥ-yadi śabdasāmyasya sakalakalamityādau nopamāprayojakatā kathaṃ tarhi “vidvanmānasahaṃsa” ityādau rājño haṃsāropasya mānasāsādhāraṇaprayojakatā ceti /
GK16visa10cu:1564: (vi, ṅa) nanu sādharmyaṃ tāvat samāno dharmastasyāvāstavatve tadanupapannam /
GK16visa10cu:1565: vidvanmānasetyādau tvabhedāropa āhāryye 'vāstavatve 'pi śliṣṭaśabdarūpadoṣeṇa sambhavatyeva ityata āha---kiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:1577: ityupamāyā evāṅgitvena vyapadeśo jyāyān “pradhānena hi byapadeśā bhavanti” iti nyāyāt /
GK16visa10cu:1578: nanu śabdālaṅkāraviṣaye 'ṅgāṅgibhāvasaṅkaro nāṅgīkriyate tatkathamatra śleṣopamayoraṅgāṅgabhāvaḥ saṅkara iti cet ?
GK16visa10cu:1583: (vi, ca) nanu tatraiva śabdabodhyatvarūpasādṛśyāttatropamāpadaṃ gauṇamevetyata āhakiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:1591: tathā ca śliṣṭapadārthānusandhānena sāmyapratītau tato 'ṅginyupamā pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:1603: śleṣādestvarthānusādhānāt sāpekṣatvena parasparāpekṣāsambhavāt kathaṃ vā na svīkriyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1613: (vi, cha) itthaṃ sakalakalamityatropamaiva na śleṣa iti sādhite śleṣādhīnavastudhvanāvapi na śleṣālaṅkāra ityāha---satpakṣā iti /
GK16visa10cu:1615: tatra dhārttarāṣṭrāḥ kṛṣṇavarṇacañcūcaraṇā haṃsaviśeṣāḥ śaratkālavaśāt medinīpṛṣṭe nipantītyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1621: tatra dhārttarāṣṭrā dhṛtarāṣṭrāputrā duryyodhanādayaḥ prasādhitāśāḥ śāsitadiṅmaṇḍalāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1623: satpakṣāḥ prakṛṣṭasahāyāḥ kālavaśād yamavaśāt madhuragiraḥ kāntavācaḥ medinīṣṭe nipatanti ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1631: atra śaradvarṇanayā prakaraṇena dhārtarāṣṭrādiśabdānāṃ haṃsādyarthābhidhāne niyamanādduryodhanādirūpor'thaḥ śabdaśaktimūlo vastudhvaniḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1632: iha ca prakṛtaprabandhābhidheyasya dvitīyārthasya sūcyatayaiva vivakṣitatvādupamānopameyabhāvo na vivakṣita iti nopamādhvanirna vā śleṣa iti sarvamavadātam /
GK16visa10cu:1635: (vi, ja) atra copamādhvanitvaṃ śleṣālaṅkāraśca na prasajyata ityāha---iha ceti /
GK16visa10cu:1636: prakṛtaprabandho veṇīsaṃhāranāṭakaṃ tadabhidheyasya tatpratipādyasya kurūṇāṃ maraṇarūpasya dvitīyārthasya sūcyatayaiva vyaṅgyatayetyarthaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:1643: sakalakalamityādau ca śleṣaghaṭita upamālaṅkāra evetyādikaṃ viśaditamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1646: sūcyatayaiva vivakṣitatvāt yaduktamatraiva nāṭakalakṣaṇāvasare “sūcayed vastubījaṃ vā mukhyapātramathāpivā“iti upameyopamānabhāvo haṃsādīnāṃ duryodhanādibhaiḥ sahetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1652: (lo, au) samprati rasānupakārakamapi kavibhisteṣu teṣu śaktipradarśanārthamupanibaddhatvātprācyairalaṅkāramadhye lakṣitaṃ citraṃ nirūpayati---padmeti /
GK16visa10cu:1653: asya cālaṅkāratāyāṃ tathāvidhanaipuṇyādisaṃskāravaśena vismayāveśo yathākathañcid bījam /
GK16visa10cu:1656: asya ca tathāvidhilipisanniveśaviśeṣavaśena camatkāravidhāyināmapi varṇānāṃ tathāvidhaśrotrākāśasamavāyavi śeṣavaśena camatkāravidhāyibhirvarṇerabhedenopacārācchabdālaṅkāratvam /
GK16visa10cu:1660: atra varṇasmārakalipīnāṃ sanniveśasyaiva padmādyākārakatvāllipīnāṃ cāśabdatvāt śabdālaṅkāratvamasyānupapannamityāśaṅky samādhatte---tathāvidhaśrotreti /
GK16visa10cu:1661: tathāvidhalipismāryyavarṇasya yaḥ śrotrarūpa ākāśe samavāyaviśeṣaḥ tadvaśena camatkārādhāyibhirvarṇaiḥ saha lipeḥ abhedopacārādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1662: tādṛśasamavāyasya varṇānubhavajanakatvaṃ tajjanitasaṃskāreṇa lipito varṇasmaraṇaṃ tataścamatkāra ityetatparamparayā śrotrākāśasamavāyasya camatkārajanakatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:1669: atra hiśabdānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvamātreṇa śabdalaṅkāratvāṅgīkāre 'nuprasāntaḥ- pātitvameva syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1673: māttadhūrtatamāvāsā sā vāmā me 'stu mā ramā” //
GK16visa10cu:1678: māttadhūrttatamā vāsā sā vāmā me 'stu māramā” //
GK16visa10cu:1688: pūrvatrānvitasyāpi āvṛttyā paścādapyanvayena sā vāmā me māramā kāmalakṣmīrastu /
GK16visa10cu:1689: āvṛttivaśena sā vāmā ityasya paścādapyanvayena tasya vā parakīyapadatvādapi tatparatvād me ityādeśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1700: karṇikāyāmādyavarṇaṃ likhitvā dale dvau dvau varṇau lekhyau /
GK16visa10cu:1703: (lo, ā) mārameti---māyā lakṣmyā ramaṇāt māramo viṣṇustasya asusamā praṇasamā /
GK16visa10cu:1706: ātto gṛhīto dhūrttatamasyāvāso yathā evaṃbhūtā na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1707: tathābhūtā sā prasiddhā ramā lakṣmīrme vāmā,
GK16visa10cu:1710: karṇikāyām “mā” śabdaṃ vinyasya “ramā” ityasyākṣaradvayaṃ tatra digdale liśitvā,
GK16visa10cu:1711: “su'; “ṣa'; iti akṣaradvayaṃ vidigdalena praveśya “cāru” ityakṣarābhyāmitaradigradalena nirgamapraveśau /
GK16visa10cu:1713: iti akṣaradvaṃya dattvā tadanantaradigdale “dhūrtta” ityakṣaradvayena praviśya punaḥ karṇikākṣarāt prabhṛti tenaiva nirgamya “tamā” ityakṣaradvayena,

GK16visa10cu:3061: iha ekadeśavarttini rūpake kṣitibhṛd rājā eva kṣitibhṛt parvata iti śliṣṭam /
GK16visa10cu:3062: tātrālaṅkārikacaṇḍidāsapaṇḍitādayaḥ rājani parvatatvāropaṇaṃ nistriṃśasya tamālavanatvāropaṇe heturiti śliṣṭaparimparitamādriyante /
GK16visa10cu:3067: apitu haṭhakāmukakāryye 'pīti pratāpakīrttyornāyikanāyikātvopakaraṇatvād iha prakṛtasūtroktaṃ śliṣṭaikadeśarūpyaṃ sāvayavaikadeśavivartirūpakameva bhāvituṃ yuktaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:3069: kiñca śliṣṭaparamparite vidvanmānasahaṃsetyādau rājño haṃsatvaṃ mānasasya mānasatvāropaṇasādṛśyaṃ vināsiddham /
GK16visa10cu:3070: iha tu nistriṃśasya tamālavanāntatvaṃ nīlimādināpi prasiddham /
GK16visa10cu:3074: kevalaṃ mānasādipadeṣu ākṣipyamāṇaṃ sarovarādyartharūpaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ haṃsatvādisādhakamātram /
GK16visa10cu:3075: ataevātra kṣaṇadānibhetyasyāpi padasya rātrikālākṣepeṇa aniḥ śeṣaṃ bhātīti tamaso bahulībhāvāt haṭharamaṇopayogiteti prācyānāmapi vyākhyā /
GK16visa10cu:3076: tadevaṃ kṣitibhṛta ityādi sarveṣāṃ rūpyamāṇānāṃ haṭharamaṇopakaraṇatvād yathoktameva jyāyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3079: āntarnimagnacarapuṣpaśaro 'tipātā-- tkiṃ kiṃ cakāra taruṇo nayadīkṣaṇāgniḥ //
GK16visa10cu:3080: ityatra nayanāgneḥ taruṇatvasya prauḍhatvarūpamarthamādāya prathamamabhidhāyā viśrāmād vyañjanayaiva yuvarūpor'thaḥ pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:3081: iha tu kṣitibhṛta ityādau bahūnāṃ rūpaṇāt pratāpasya taruṇatvarūpaṇaṃ śābdam /
GK16visa10cu:3085: haṭhādānīya ramata ityatra kāryyasāmye 'pi na samāsoktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3086: yadi hi kāryyaleśasāmyaṃ vā samāśritya samāsoktiraṅgīkāryyā tadekadeśavivartirūpakasya viṣayāpahāra eva syāt,
GK16visa10cu:3088: yatra vācā rūpaṇaṃ nāsti dyāmāliliṅgetyādi samāsoktyudāharaṇavat kāryyasāmyabāhulyasamvalitatvam,
GK16visa10cu:3090: ābhātītyādau ca vācyarūpaṇānāṃ bahutvena kāryyādisāmyaṃ svalpatayā tatsahāyyamevācarati iti /
GK16visa10cu:3092: anayośca samāsoktyekadeśavivartirūpakayoraparamapi yuktijātamihaiva samāsoktiprastāve suvyaktaṃ bhaviṣyatītyalaṃ bahunā /
GK16visa10cu:3102: “rājamaṇḍalarāhave” ityādiṣu sarvatra samāsa eva tasya darśitatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:3107: tathā cātra bhrūlatayā hetunā madhupaśreṇīṃ vidhirvidadhe ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3108: bhrūlatāṃ vidhātuṃ madhupaśreṇīṃ vidadhe iti paryyavasitor'thaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3112: vidadha ityādau tava bhrūlatā madhupaśreṇī ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3116: yaireṣāpi durāśayā kaliyuge rājāvalī sevitā teṣāṃ śūlini bhaktimātrasulabhe sevā kiyatkauśalam” //
GK16visa10cu:3123: atra kaliyuge yairdurāśayā eṣā rājāvalī nṛpaśreṇī sevitā bhaktimātrasulabhe śūlini teṣāṃ sevā kiyat kauśalam /
GK16visa10cu:3145: atra ca keṣāñcidrūpakāṇāṃ śabdaśleṣamūlatve 'pi rūpakaviśeṣatvādarthālaṅkāramavye gaṇanam /
GK16visa10cu:3148: (lo, au) nanu padmodayetyādau paramparitādeḥ śabdānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvātkathaṃ vār'thālaṅkāramadhye gaṇanamityata āha---atreti /
GK16visa10cu:3158: ime netre rātrindivamadhikaśobhe kuvalaye tanurlāvaṇyānāṃ jaladhiravagāhe sukhataraḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:3166: evamuttaratra sudhādhārāyā ādhāro 'dharaścirakālasthameva pariṇataṃ pakkaṃ bimbam /
GK16visa10cu:3170: kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyātparaṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede” //
GK16visa10cu:3174: (lo, a) adhikārūḍhaṃ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ viśeṣa ārthādāropyamāṇādāropaviṣayasya yatretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3175: avagāhe sukhatara ityatra lavaṇedadhirmakarataraṅgalavaṇādisadbhāvādavagāhakānāṃ sukhāvaho na bhavatītyāśayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3179: kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyātparaṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede” //
GK16visa10cu:3186: tatkāryyasya śarīraśobhākaraṇasya madanoddīpanasya ca prastutvena kenacid anusandhīyamānatvābhāvāt /
GK16visa10cu:3192: ityādivad atiśayoktireva bhavituṃ yukteti māmakaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3213: rūpake vidyamānāyā api tādātmyapratīterna paryyantaṃ gantumākāṅkṣā ityāśayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3214: pariṇāmālaṅkārasya tathābhūto rūpyamāṇo vidyate yad etaddviprakāraṃ pariṇāmaṃ nāma nirvakti /
GK16visa10cu:3219: natu sato dharmiṇo vai pūrvarūpaparityāgena rūpāntarāpatteriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3235: atrā'śleṣe āropyamāṇaḥ paṇo vāstavaśleṣatayaiva pariṇataḥ anuṣṭhīyamānadyūtopayogī /
GK16visa10cu:3244: iha tūpāyanoderviṣayeṇa tādātmyaṃ prakṛte ca nāyakasaṃbhāvanādāvupayogaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3249: (vi, na) rūpake āropyamāṇasyānuṣṭhīyamānārthopayogo nāstīti darśayati---rūpake iti /
GK16visa10cu:3257: upāyanena sambhāvanasya paṇena dyūtasya ca nirvāhāt /
GK16visa10cu:3270: tādātmyaṃ tatra niveśaḥ smitādeḥ upāyanatvamasti tadviśeṣakatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:3279: (vi, pa) dāse kṛtāgasītyādiślokīyarūpake tu pariṇāmāprasaktiṃ darśayati---dāse iti /
GK16visa10cu:3280: nanvatra kathaṃ rūpakamevetyuktaṃ sūkṣmāgratvena kaṭhoratvena ca pulakāṅkurāṇāṃ kaṇṭakabhedasya vāstavatvādevetyāha---āropyamāṇeti /
GK16visa10cu:3282: atra yadyapi pulakasya kaṇṭakāropaviṣayatvameva kaṇṭakatvenāropyamāṇatvaṃ yathāpi pādabhedakāryyakatve 'nāropyamāṇasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3283: tathāca tatkāryyanirvāhakatvaṃ yatastasyāropyamāṇamatastasya kaṇṭakatvamapi na vāstavam /
GK16visa10cu:3292: ityatrāpi gurudakṣiṇāyāḥ suratinaipuṇyena pariṇāmāt pariṇaāmālaṅkāra eveti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:3302: yatra himālaye auṣadhaya eva rajanyāṃ vanecarāṇāṃ vanitāsakhānāṃ suratapradīpā bhavanti ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3318: pratibhayā utthito 'nyasyāprastutārthakoṭeḥ prastute vastuni yaḥ saṃśayaḥ sa sandehālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3325: evaṃca saṃśaya ityetāvataiva lakṣaṇe paryāpte prakṛte anyasyeti vacanaṃ “madhyaṃ tava ” ityādi vṛttyudāhariṣyamāṇavyavacchedārtham /
GK16visa10cu:3329: evañca kavivarṇitasyāpi “sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā” iti saṃśayasya nālaṅkāratā /
GK16visa10cu:3333: yatra saṃśaya eva paryavasānaṃ sa śuddhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3335: “kiṃ tāruṇyataroriyaṃ rasabhahodbhinnā navā vallarī velāprocchalitasya kiṃ laharikā lāvaṇyavārāṃnidheḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3336: udrāḍhotkalikāvatāṃ svasamayopanyāsaviśrambhiṇaḥ kiṃ sākṣādupadeśayaṣṭirathavā devasya śṛṅgāriṇaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:3340: iyaṃ nāyikā kiṃ lāvaṇyataroḥ navā vallarī /
GK16visa10cu:3342: kīdṛśī rasabharodbhinnā śṛṅgararasa eva rasojalaṃ tenodbhinno jalasekena latodbhedāt /
GK16visa10cu:3343: kiṃvā velayā nīreṇa procchalitasya ucchalitasya lāvaṇyarūpasya vārāṃnidheḥ samudrasyalaharikā taraṅgaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3345: kiṃ vā śṛṅgāriṇo devasya kandarpasya arthāt śṛṅgārārthamuddamotkalikānatāṃ gāḍhotkaṇṭhāvatāṃ janānāṃ sthāne upadeśasya arthāt śṛṅgāropadeśsya sākṣād vaṣṭiṇalambanabhūtā yaṣṭiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3347: devasya kīdṛśasya svasamayasya vasantasya upanyāsena viśrammiṇo viśvastasya mamedānīmupadeśo yogya ityaveṃ viśvāsavata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3360: tathāhi---yasyāḥ kasyā api vidyāyā upadeṣṭāraḥ capalacittanivāraṇāya tāḍanārthaṃ yaṣṭimādadate iti lokaprasiddhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3362: yatrādāvante ca saṃśaya eva madhye niścayaḥ sa niścayamadhyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3364: “ayaṃ mārtaṇḍaḥ kiṃ sa khalu turagaiḥ saptabhiritaḥ kṛśānuḥ kiṃ sarvāḥ prasarati diśo naiṣa niyatam /
GK16visa10cu:3365: kṛtāntaḥ kiṃ sākṣānmahiṣavahano 'sāviti punaḥ samālokyājau tvāṃ vidadhati vikalpān pratibhaṭāḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:3377: ājau yuddhe tvāṃ samālokya pratibhaṭāḥ pratikūlavīrā ityevaṃ vitarkān vidadhati kurvānti /
GK16visa10cu:3389: yatrādau saṃśayo 'nte ca niścayaḥ sa niścayāntaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3400: kīdṛśaiḥ bakasahavāsināṃ parokṣaiḥ--bakā hi matsyaniścayārthaṃ dhyāyinastatsahavāsinastataḥ śikṣitadhyānāsteṣāmapi parokṣaiḥ apratyakṣaiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3403: apratibhotthāpite tu “sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā” ityādisaṃśaye nāyamalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3413: asti nāstīti saṃdehaḥ kasya citte na bhāsate” //
GK16visa10cu:3419: sandehaḥ kasya citte na bhāsate ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3420: tatrātiśayoktiḥ iti vakṣyamāṇāyāḥ pañcavidhāyā atiśayokterbhede 'pyabhedāroparūpaprabheda evātretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3430: bhrāntiścittadharmaviśeṣo vidyate yatra bhramaprakāre sa bhrāntimān ityanvarthanāmālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3433: “mugdhā dugdhadhiyā gavāṃ vidadhate kumbhānagho vallavāḥ karṇe kairavaśaṅkayā kuvalayaṃ kurvanti kāntā api /
GK16visa10cu:3434: karkandhūphasamuccinoti śabarī muktāphalāśaṅkayā sāndrā candramaso na kasya kurute cittabhramaṃ candrikā” //
GK16visa10cu:3440: candramasaḥ sāndrā candrikā kasya janasya cittavibhramaṃ na kurute ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3442: ballavāḥ gopāḥ mugdhā bhrāntāḥ santaḥ dugdhadhiyā gavāmadhaḥ kumbhān vidadhate dugdhamādātumityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3463: saṅge saiva tathaikā tribhuvanamapi tanmayaṃ virahe” //
GK16visa10cu:3471: na cātrāpi tribhuvane tatsādṛśyabhramāttadbhrama iti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:3473: tathāca saṅgamād virahasyādhikyād vyatirekālaṅkāraḥ evāyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3474: evaṃ ca lobhādinā bhrame 'pi na bhrāntimān /
GK16visa10cu:3487: ekasyānekadhollekho yaḥ sa ullekha ucyate // VisSd_10.37 //
GK16visa10cu:3498: “priya iti gopavadhūbhiḥ śiśuriti vṛddhairadhīśa iti devaiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3507: “āpo hi nārāḥ” tadayanaḥ tatstho nārāyaṇaḥ jalaśāyī ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3509: atraikasyāpi bhagavatastattadguṇayogādanekadhollekhe gopavadhūprabhṛtīnāṃ rucyādayo yathāyogaṃ prayojakāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3520: tathāca tādṛśarucimanto grahītāro bhinnā iti darśitam /
GK16visa10cu:3528: ekasminnarthe anusandhānena manoniveśena sādhita ābhāsaḥ jñānaṃ buddhirapi yathārucyādi---bhedāt bhidyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3537: evaṃ ca priya ityādau bhagavataḥ priyatve gopavadhūnāṃ rucyāditritayamapi prayojakam /
GK16visa10cu:3541: atra bhagavataḥ priyatvādīnāṃ vāstavatvād grahītṛbhedācca na mālārūpakam,
GK16visa10cu:3545: na ceha bhagavati gopavadhūprabhṛtibhiḥ priyatvādyadhyavasīyate priyatvāderbhagavati tatkāle tāttvikatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:3548: (vi, ka) atra mālārūpakaprasāktiṃ nirasyati---atra bhagavata iti /
GK16visa10cu:3551: yadyapi vāstavatvena rūpakāprasaktau mālārūpakaprasaktirapi tata eva nirastā tathāpi grahītṛbhedapradarśanaṃ mālāpariṇāmaprasaktivāraṇasūcanārtham /
GK16visa10cu:3561: kintu priyatvādyadhyavasīyate iti kvacit prāmādikaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3562: sa cādhyavasīyata ityatra nirasyate ityevaṃ lakṣaṇayā samarthanīyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3566: (lo, i) bhagavatastatkāle tāttvikatvād grītṛbhedācceti hetordvayamapi mālārūpakabhrāntimatordvayorapi vivekaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3570: grotṛbhedasya ca dvayorapi sambhave 'pi apavādatvena ullekhākhyabhinnālaṅkārasya na prayojakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3576: uktodāharaṇe ca śiśutvādīnāṃ niyamanābhiprāyātpriyatvādīnāṃ bhinnatvādhyavasāya ityatiśayoktirasti,
GK16visa10cu:3580: (vi, kha) alaṅkārāntarasaṅkarāt tadbhaṅgimūla eva niyamenāyamalaṅkāra iti kecidāhuḥ taddarśayati---keciditi /
GK16visa10cu:3586: tathāca yūni deve śiśubhinne 'pi niyamataḥ śiśvabhedāropād bhede 'pyabhedāropārūpātiśayoktirdarśitā /
GK16visa10cu:3587: atra ca niyamapradarśanaṃ teṣāṃ tathātvena bhāvanātiśayapradarśanārthameva,
GK16visa10cu:3591: tathā ca bhinnārthādhyavasāya ityatra bhinnatvavatyadhyavasāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3593: tathā ca asvāmini deve svāmitvāropa eva svāmyabhedāropa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3598: nanvevamatiśayoktisattve sa evātrāṅkāro 'stu nollekha ityata āha---tatsadbhaṇepīti /
GK16visa10cu:3608: “api ca paraśabdaḥ paratra lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena vartate iti yatra prayoktṛpratipatroḥ saṃpratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:3610: iha tu vātikānāṃ śrīkaṇṭhajanapadavarṇane bhrāntikṛta evāmbaravivarādyāropa iti /
GK16visa10cu:3614: śrīkaṇṭhanāmā rājaviśeṣaḥ tasya nagaraṃ śaraṇāgataiḥ śatruto bhītaiḥ vajrapañjaramityabodhītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3628: āropādhikaraṇasya praṅnirdeśe rūpakaṃ yathā---ayaṃ candra ityatra /
GK16visa10cu:3634: tatra mūlakatvapradarśanaṃ ca tatpūrvake pariṇāmālaṅkāre tathātvābhāvapradarśanāya /
GK16visa10cu:3639: lakṣyamāṇo jñāyamāno ya āropasya guṇo dharma āropādhikaraṇasya tadyogenetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3641: gaurvāhīka ityādau gauṇīlakṣaṇāsthale tu lakṣaṇayeti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3643: saṃpratipattiryatra śabde prayoktṛpratipatroḥ sa śabdo gauṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3650: ayamarthaḥ--bhagavataḥ śiśutvādibhedeṣu satsvapi gopavadhūbhiḥ priya ityevāyaṃ gṛhyate na śiśuriti /
GK16visa10cu:3651: yathā priyatvādau satyapi vṛddhaiḥ śiśurityeva gṛhyate /
GK16visa10cu:3653: yadi tvayaṃ pratyetṛbhedena bhede 'tiśayoktisadbhāva eva syāttadātiśayoktiprakāraviśeṣa eva syāt naca tathā,
GK16visa10cu:3665: mugdhā dugdhadhiyetyādau mithyājñānasya kavipratibhāhṛtatvena kavinā ballavādiniṣṭhatvena satyatvenopanibaddhatvād rūpakādītyādiśabdenāpahnutyādisaṃgrahaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3668: tathāpi kathaṃ tatrāropasya bhedapratītipuraḥ saratvamityatrācāryyasammatiṃ śārīramīmāṃsābhāṣyaṃ śrīmadācāryyaśaṅkarabhagavatpādakṛtam /
GK16visa10cu:3669: paraśabdo 'gnirmāṇavaka ityādau māṇavakādiśabdaḥ paratra māṇavakādau tanmate lakṣyamāṇo guṇastekṣṇayapiṅgalādiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3674: bhrāntikṛta eva prācyānāṃ mate bhrāntikṛtatvābhāve punā rūpakamasti iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3675: atra bhrāntimato 'laṅkāratve 'pi nālaṅkārāntaravicchittimūlatvaṃ hīyata iti prakṛte na kācit kṣatiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3677: atraiva ca “capovanamiti munibhiḥ kāmāyatanamiti veśyābhiḥ” ityādau pariṇāmālaṅkārayogaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3680: śrīkaṇṭhajanapade tapovanatvādyāropasya munyādeḥ prakṛte tapaḥ prabhṛtāvupayogāt /
GK16visa10cu:3682: munyādīnāṃ tu tapovanādibhinnarūpasya tadrūpatāpratīteriha bhrāntimāniti ye /
GK16visa10cu:3683: apyāhuḥ teṣāmayamāśayaḥ--- śrīkaṇṭhajanapade ekadeśasya tapovanāditvepyavayavāvayavinorabhedātsamudāyasya tathātvapratītiriha na tāttvikīti na pariṇām iti /
GK16visa10cu:3684_1: vicchittiviśeṣasya sambhavāt tatprayojitasya ullekhālaṅkārasyāpalāpo na śakyakriya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3694: naca tapovanatvasya kathaṃ tatra vāstavatvamiti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:3702: arjuno yaśasi-” ityādiṣu cāsya rūpakādvivikto viṣaya iti /
GK16visa10cu:3721_0: naca durgālaṅghitavigraha ityādivadupamādhvanirayamiti vācyam tatra viśeṣyasya śliṣṭomāvallabhapadasyevātra
