GK16visa10cu:4471: vikrīya kaivalyamamuṣya mūlyaṃ varāṭasaṃkhyāṃ kimiyaṃ karoti” //
GK16visa10cu:4477: paryavasāne tu jaladhitīre śaivālasthiteḥ sambhāvanānupapattau sambhāvanotthāpanamityutprekṣā /
GK16visa10cu:4482: pārejalamiti---murāriḥ śrīkṛṣṇaḥ nīranidheḥ samudrasya pārejalaṃ jalasya pāre kūle vanāvalīrapaśyat /
GK16visa10cu:4491: ityanenaivopamāparyavasānasambhave utkūlatvakathanamanupayuktamata utkūlitaśaivalābhā iveti paryavasāne utprekṣetyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4503: evaṃ virahavarṇane--“keyūrāyitamaṅgadaiḥ--” ityatra “vikāsinīlotpalatisma karṇe mṛgāyatākṣyāḥ kuṭilaḥ kaṭākṣaḥ” ityādau ca jñeyam /
GK16visa10cu:4517: bhrāntimadalaṅkāre “mugghā dugdhadhiyā--” ityādau bhrāntānāṃ ballavādīnāṃ viṣayasya candrikāderjñānameva nāsti,
GK16visa10cu:4522: (vi, ña) bhrāntimadalaṅkāre niścayo 'tra tu utkaṭakoṭikaḥ saṃśaya iti bhedasambhave 'pi bhedakāntaramāha---bhrāntimadalaṅkāra iti /
GK16visa10cu:4526: nanu, “na kasya kurute cittabhramaṃcandrikā” ityuktitaścandrikātvena jñānamastītyata āha---tadupanibandhasyeti /
GK16visa10cu:4528: tathā ca kavyuktyā śrotṝṇāṃ ballavādīnāṃ na candrikātvena jñānamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4544: (vi, ṭa) tarhi sandehālaṅkārābheda ityata āha---sandeha iti /
GK16visa10cu:4549: ityatra kalāpabhramānantarameva keśatvaviśeṣadarśanāt kalāpe'satyatā pratipādyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4552: vastutastu yonibahirbhāvarūpaprasavabādhasyeva nāyikāśirasi kalāpabhādhasyāpi sattve evāhāryatadubhayabuddhisattvenobhayatra sāmyameva /
GK16visa10cu:4555: “kathamupari” ityatra hi kalāpasyāhāryaniścaya eva kathaṃpadabodhyaḥ sandehaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4560: “rañjitā nu vividhāstaruśalā nāmitaṃ nu gaganaṃ sthagitaṃ nu /
GK16visa10cu:4561: pūritā nu viṣameṣu dharitrī saṃhṛtā nu kakubhastimireṇa” //
GK16visa10cu:4564: (vi, ṭha) utprekṣālaṅkārasyaiva viṣaye kvacicchloke sandehālaṅkāraṃ kecidāhuḥ,
GK16visa10cu:4573: ityatra yattarvādau timirākrāntatā rañjanādirūpeṇa saṃdihyata iti saṃdehālaṅkāra iti kecidāhuḥ,
GK16visa10cu:4575: iha tu tarvādivyāpteḥ pratisaṃbandhibhedo vyāpanādernigaraṇena rañjanādeḥ sphuraṇaṃ ca /
GK16visa10cu:4576: anye tu--“anekatvanirdhāraṇarūpavicchittyāśrayatvenaikakoṭyadhike 'pi bhinno 'yaṃ saṃdehaprakāraḥ” iti vadanti sma;
GK16visa10cu:4578: tasyāścātra sphuṭatayā sadbhāvāt nuśabdena cevaśabdavattasyādyotanādutprekṣaiveyaṃ bhavituṃ yuktā,
GK16visa10cu:4587: nanu prativiśeṣyaṃ sandehā eva bahavaḥ syurityatra utprekṣāprāpakahetuviśeṣaścāstītyāha---vyāpanāderiti /
GK16visa10cu:4616: “yadetaccandrāntarjaladalavalīlāṃ vitanute tadācaṣṭe lokaḥ śaśaka iti no māṃ prati tathā /
GK16visa10cu:4624: jaladalavasya jaladakhaṇḍasya jaladakhaṇḍasya sādṛśyarūpāṃ līlāṃ vitanute tad vastu,
GK16visa10cu:4627: māṃ prati tu na tathācaṣṭe ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4630: tvayā vandīkṛtānāmarīṇāṃ viraheṇākrāntānāṃ tadīyataruṇīnāṃ kaṭākṣolkāpātairjāto yo vraṇastasya kiṇo vraṇasthāne prakaṭabhāgaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:4659: viṣayiṇo 'bhedapratipattirarthād viṣaye adhyavasāya iha vivakṣita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4663: tadapyavispaṣṭārthamato viśeṣārthakaṃ śabdaṃ vinā vyañjanayaiva viṣayaniṣedhabuddhiradhaḥ karaṇam /
GK16visa10cu:4678: (vi, tha) siddhatva ityasya vyāvṛttiṃ darśayati---tasya ceti /
GK16visa10cu:4681: utprekṣāvāraṇaṃ niścayatvavivakṣayaiva na tu nigaraṇapūrvakatvavivakṣayeti darśayati---viṣayanigaraṇaṃ ceti /
GK16visa10cu:4683: utprekṣāyāṃ ca viṣayatāvacchedakakoṭeḥ kvacidanuktivaśāt kvaciccoktāyā api anutkaṭatvaśānniṣedhavyañjanā /
GK16visa10cu:4685: ” ityatra garbhabahirbhāvarūpaprasavakoṭyā utkaṭāyā anutkaṭāyā guṇānubandhakoṭyā uktāyā eva niṣedhavyañjanā /
GK16visa10cu:4687: atiśayoktiviśeṣe 'pi na tadasambhava ityata āha---ihāpi mukhaṃ dvitīyaḥ ityādi /
GK16visa10cu:4690: dvitīyapadābhāve tu nedṛśaī niṣedhapratītiriti tatra rūpakameva /
GK16visa10cu:4698: (vi, da) yadāhuriti---anigīrṇasyopāttasya nigīrṇasyānupāttasya adhaḥ-- karaṇaṃ tu vivṛtameva /
GK16visa10cu:4714: kuvalayayugalaṃ tato vilolaṃ tilakusumaṃ tadadhaḥ pravālamasmāt” //
GK16visa10cu:4758: “asyāḥ sargavidhau prajāpatirabhūccandro nu kāntipradaḥ śṛṅgāraikarasaḥ svaya nu madano māso nu puṣpākaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4759: vedābhyāsajaḍaḥ kathaṃ nu viṣayavyāvṛttakautūhalo nirmātuṃ prabhavenmanoharamidaṃ rūpaṃ purāṇo muniḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:4769: asyā nirmāṇavidhau prajāpatrirnirmātā candraḥ yato 'sau kāntipradaḥ kāntimattvenaiva tasya kāntipradatvaṃ sambhāvyoktam /
GK16visa10cu:4787: indumaṇḍale indīvarasya sambandha eva syādityevaṃ sambandhasambhāvanā /
GK16visa10cu:4791: iha yadyapi candramaṇḍalasyendīvaradvayena sambandho na sambhavati tathāpi kavinā nibaddhasya vā sambhāvanārūpeṇāsāvastītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4792: etena “yadyarthoktau ca kalpana” miti kaiścidukto 'tiśayokterbheda udāhṛtaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:4801: naceha tasyā mukhaṃ candra itivadāropamūlaṃ rūpakam /
GK16visa10cu:4803: atra hī madanasya udyamaṃ vināpi kokilarutamātreṇa jagadvaśamāsīdityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4806: “iyaṃ kāntā yuvajanamanaso vaśīkaraṇa” mityādau ca hetvalaṅkāro vakṣyate /
GK16visa10cu:4807: sa tasyā evāsambandhe sambandharūpeṇa bhedena saṅgṛhyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4808: atra śuddhodāharaṇaṃ virahavarṇane---“dāho 'mbhaḥ prasṛtiṃ pacaḥ pracayavān bāṣpaḥ praṇālocita'; ityādi /
GK16visa10cu:4809: atra dāhādīnām ambhaḥ prasṛtipākādyaiḥ asambandhe 'pi sambandhaḥ siddhatvenoktaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4830: tena siṃhāsanaṃ pitryaṃ maṇḍalaṃ ca kahīkṣitām” //
GK16visa10cu:4848: ityatra tatraiva tadbhedārope bhedaghaṭitaviṣayaviṣayibhāvābhāvādavyāptiriti keṣāñciduktiṃ darśayati---keśapāśādigata iti /
GK16visa10cu:4857: tathā ca bhinnatvenādhyavasāyādāropaviṣaye 'bhede tadbhinnasya bhedasyāropād bhedaghaṭīto viṣayaviṣayibhāvo 'trāpyastīti sādhitam /
GK16visa10cu:4859: atraivotprekṣāsambhavād bhedaghaṭitāropaḥ tvanmate 'pītyāha---tathā hīti---atiśayoktito vāyavṛttidarśanāya sādhyatvapradarśanam “prāgeva hariṇākṣīṇām';
GK16visa10cu:4867: iha cānyādiśabdākhyaṃ lāvāṇyādeḥ kimapi pratinidhivastvantaraṃ nāsti /
GK16visa10cu:4871: padārthānāṃ prastutānāmanyeṣāṃ vā yadā bhavet // VisSd_10.47 //
GK16visa10cu:4900: suciraṃ śayitaṃ tena samayena tādṛśarātrirūpeṇa pratibodhitaṃ jāgaritaṃ smaram anulepanādayo abodhiṣata krīḍārthaṃ bodhayāmāsurityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4902: tamasaḥ kāmoddīpakatvāt tasmin prastute tatkālīnānāmanyeṣāmuddīpakānāmanulepanādīnāmapi prastutatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4910: taddraṣṭuḥ kasya janasya citte mālatyādīnāṃ kaṭhoratā na bhāsate /
GK16visa10cu:4920: (vi, ṣa) prakṛtānāmekaguṇasambandho 'prakṛtānāmevakriyāsambandhaścānudāhṛta evaślokena udāhriyate---evaṃ dānaṃ vittāditi /
GK16visa10cu:4929: iha ca tulyayogitāyāṃ “hasaścandra ivābhātī'tyādivad dvayoḥ prakṛtatve 'pyupamānopameyabhāvo vaivakṣikaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4940: iha ca dvayoḥ prakṛtāprakṛtatvādivādyabhāvādaupamyasya gamyatvaṃ sphuṭameva /
GK16visa10cu:4949: pūrvavaddhiraṇyakaśipurūpapūrvajanmavat jigīṣuṇā śiśupālenāpi jagad bādhyata ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4953: atra prastutāyāḥ suniścalāyāḥ prakṛteraprastutāyāśca yoṣita ekānugamanakriyāsambandhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4954: “dūraṃ samāgatavati tvayi jīvanāthe bhinnā manobhavaśareṇa tapasvinī sā /
GK16visa10cu:4955: uttiṣṭhati svapiti vāsagṛha tvadīya- māyāti yāti hasati śvasiti kṣaṇena” //
GK16visa10cu:4961: tapasvinī duḥ khānvitā sā tava priyā vāsagṛhagamanaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:4966: atra ca guṇakriyayorādimadhyāvasānasadbhāvena traividhyaṃ na lakṣitam,
GK16visa10cu:4973: “rahei mihireṇa ṇahaṃ raseṇa kavviṃ sareṇa jovvaṇaaṃ /
GK16visa10cu:4979: eko 'pi dharmaḥ sāmānyo yatra nirdiśyate pṛthak /
GK16visa10cu:4985: tayoreko 'pi sāmānyo dharmaḥ pṛthakśabdabhedena yatrālaṅkāre nirdiśyate sā prativastūpametyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4987: bodhyatā ca kvacicchabdadvayena śaktilakṣaṇābhyāṃ kvaciccopameyagatasya śabdaśaktyā dhramāntare tadvaidharmyeṇa vyañjanayā /
GK16visa10cu:4991: evaṃ ca pratinirdiṣṭena vākyārthena vākyārthasya upamāsādṛśyaṃ yasyāmityanena vākyārthasyopamāsādṛśyaṃ yasyāmityanvarthā pratīvastūpamā /
GK16visa10cu:4993: pṛthak paryyāyādinā nirdiśyate pratipādyate paunaruktyanirāsāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4999: itaḥ stutiḥ kā khalu candrikāyā yadabdhimapyuttaralīkaroti” //
GK16visa10cu:5000: atra samākarṣaṇamuttaralīkaraṇaṃ ca kriyaikaiva paunaruktyanirāsāya bhinnavācakatayā nirdiṣṭā /
GK16visa10cu:5006: atra damayantī upameyā candrikā upamānaṃ tayordhorākarṣaṇameko dharmaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5016: “vimala eva ravirviśadaḥ śaśī prakṛtiśobhana eva hi darṇaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5017: śivagiriḥ śivahāsasahodaraḥ sahajasundara eva hi sajjanaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:5035: (vi, ṅa) vaidharmyeṇa yatheti---upameye nirdiṣṭadharmaviparītād dharmyantare nirdiṣṭāddharmād vyañjanayā labhyenopamānaniṣṭhasādharmyeṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5039_0: atra svakarmacāturyasya upameyāsu cakorīṣu nirdiṣṭasya viparīto dharmaḥ avantīyastrībhinnastrīṣu
GK16visa10cu:5039_1: nirdiṣṭo ratyanaipuṇyarūpaḥ tato vyañjanayā upamāneṣu avantīstrīṣu svakarmacāturyyaṃ
GK16visa10cu:5051: pratibimbanamubhayatra nirdiṣṭābhyāṃ parasparasamānābhyāṃ dharmābhyāmekasya tasya vyañjanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5052: sadharmaḥ prasiddha evaṃ vivakṣita ityaprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ vyaktirbhaviṣyati /
GK16visa10cu:5053: prativastūpamāyāṃ tūpameyanirdiṣṭo dharmo vācya eva upamānanirdiṣṭaśabdasya lakṣaṇayā kvacicchaktyā vā sa bodhya iti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5065: atra karṇe madhudhārāvamananetrahāraṇe dharmai bhinnau prītijanakatayā parasparasamānau /
GK16visa10cu:5078: upameyopamānagatābhyāṃ tābhyāṃ svasvapriyadarśane svārthaprāptitvameko dharmaḥ vyajyate /
GK16visa10cu:5079: naca vaidharmyavyaṅgyaprativastūpamāto 'syā ko bheda iti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:5081: atra tūpamānaniṣṭhaṃ tathā ca tatra vaidharmyeṇaiva vyañjanā /
GK16visa10cu:5082: atra tu ubhayaniṣṭhābhyāṃ sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ vyañjaneti bhedāt /
GK16visa10cu:5088: (vi, jha) yatra tu samānadharmapratipādakaśabdābhyāmeko dharmo vyañjanāṃ vinaiva pratipādyate tatra pratibimbābhāvāt prativastūpamaiveti /
GK16visa10cu:5093: atra “manaḥ kuto naḥ” ityasya “kāṅkṣati vallimanyām” ityasya caikarūpatayaiva varyavasānātprativastūpamaiva /
GK16visa10cu:5094: iha tu karṇe madhudhārāvamanasya netraharaṇasya ca sāmyameva,
GK16visa10cu:5100: atra hi paranāyikā upameyā anyā bahvyaśca upamānāni tāsāṃ manoviṣayatvākāṅkṣāviṣayatvayorhetupraśraikadharmaviṣayatayā ekatvāroparūpaparyyavasānam /
GK16visa10cu:5106: ityasya paryyavasāne nānyāṃ kāntāṃ kāṅkṣāmi ityetadarthatvād iha dṛṣṭānte tu punaḥ bimbapratibimbabhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5136: “ko 'tra bhūmivalaye janān mudhā tāpayan sucirameti sampadam /
GK16visa10cu:5141: atra būmivalaye mudhā nirarthakaṃ janāṃstāpayan kaḥ suciraṃ sampadameti /
GK16visa10cu:5143: vedayan jñāpayan dinena caramācalaṃ tato nabhomadhyādāsasādetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5153: atra karttṛtvānvayo janakatvānvayaḥ svastigamanena tādṛśavadasyānumitirūpasya janakatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:5157: paratāpino raverastagamanavadanyeṣāmapi paratāpināṃ vipatprāptirityevaṃ hi tat /
GK16visa10cu:5160: sa ca raverastācalagamanasya paritāpināṃ vipatprāpteśca bimbapratibimbabhāvaṃ bodhayati /
GK16visa10cu:5165_0: atrānyasya dharmaṃ kathamanyo vahatviti kaṭākṣavikṣepādīnāṃ kuvalayamālādigatalalitādīnāṃ
GK16visa10cu:5169: asyāḥ kuṭilaḥ kaṭākṣavikṣepaḥ kuvalayamālāyā lalitaṃ vinyāsaṃ kalayati tadhāti /
GK16visa10cu:5171: kaṭākṣavikṣepādīnāṃ kartṝṇāṃ lalitādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ dharmatayā dharmiṇorapyatra prativimbānubimbaṃ darśayati;
GK16visa10cu:5189: tava prayāṇe yātrāyāṃ satyāṃ vairimṛgīdṛśāṃ padbhyāṃ rājahaṃsagatirmuktā drutapalāyamānatvāt . ānanena ca śaśidyutirmuktā mlānatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:5196: (lo, ā) kalpyata ityataḥ pūrvaṃ prathamamiti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5201: “idaṃ kilāvyājamanoharaṃ vapustapaḥ klapaṃ sādhayituṃ ya icchati /
GK16visa10cu:5205: (vi, tha) idaṃ kileti---āśrame tapasyocitaveśāṃ śakuntalāṃ dṛṣṭvā duṣmantasyoktiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:5207: manoharamidaṃ vapuryo munistapaḥ kṣamaṃ sādhayitum icchati dhruvaṃ niścitaṃ sa munirnolotpalapatradhārayā komalayā kaṭhināṃ śamīlatāṃ chettuṃ vyavasyatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5219: (lo, i) idaṃ vapuḥ tapaḥ kṣamaṃ sādhayitumicchati yo 'nena śakuntalāyā vapuṣā tapo nirvāhayitumicchatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5232: “munestatra manobhede durlabhe surakāṅkṣite kaṭākṣā evameṇākṣyāḥ prayayuḥ smarabāṇatām /
GK16visa10cu:5239: atra bhavabhogalobhena janmano vyarthatānayanaṃ kācamūlyena cintāmaṇivikraya iveti paryavasānam /
GK16visa10cu:5284: evaṃ “so 'pi tvadānanarucaṃ vijahati candraḥ” ityatra “prayāṇe tava rājendra” ityudāharaṇavannidarśanaiva,
GK16visa10cu:5287: evaṃ “sambhavan vastusambandha upamāparikalpakaḥ nidarśane“ti lakṣaṇe copamāśabdaḥ sādṛśyamātrārtho na tūpamālaṅkārārthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5297: he puruṣa / tvaṃ bhogavitāne bhogasamūhe ceto vidadhad vṛṣadaṃśakasya mārjārasya mukhe śukaṃ kṣipasi /
GK16visa10cu:5298: yathā mārjāraḥ śukaṃ hinasti tathā bhogavitāno 'pi narakapātena hiṃsiṣyati /
GK16visa10cu:5299: ataḥ śukasya tatra kṣepa iva bhoge cetovidhānamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5318: ” iti śloke 'smākaṃ stanamaṇḍale sutarāṃ luṭhanamucitamityeva hi paryavasānam /
GK16visa10cu:5335: upameyasyopamānādādhikyaṃ nyūnatāthavā varṇyate sa vyatirekālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5338: kvacittu eka utke 'nukte hetau punaḥ tridheti kārikā /
GK16visa10cu:5356: pratyekaṃ samudāyena vānuktau trividha iti catuvidhe 'pyasminnupamānopameyatvasya nivedanaṃ śabdena arthena ākṣepeṇa ceti dvādaśaprakāro 'pi śleṣe,
GK16visa10cu:5358: upamānānnyūnatāyāmapyanayaiva bhaṅgyā caturviṃśatiprakārateti militvā aṣṭacatvāriṃśatprakāro vyatirekaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5375: tad dvādaśakasya śleṣāśleṣayoḥ sambhavaṃ kārikoktādapiśabdād darśayati---śleṣe 'pīti /
GK16visa10cu:5383: kalaṅkī vidhuryathā tasyā mukhaṃ tathā na,
GK16visa10cu:5423: tatra hetudvayasya pratyekaṃ samudāyānupādāne śābdaupamye yathā---“candramukhyāḥ kuraṅgākṣyā nābjavad bhaṅgurā guṇā';
GK16visa10cu:5456: tenātra “upamānādupameyasyādhikye viparyaye vā vyatirekaḥ” iti keṣāṃcillakṣaṇe “viparyaye vetipadamanarthakam” iti yatkecidāhuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5475: tathā cāsthairyasyāpakarṣakahetutvena upameyasya nyūnatvaṃ candrasyaivādhikyamiti mayā vāyakhyāyate,
GK16visa10cu:5484: nanūddeśyārthasyādhikyameva vivakṣitaṃ prakṛte ca māninyāṃ yauvanāsthairyyaṃ pradarśayitumuddeśyaṃ tadādhikyaṃ copameyādhikyamevetyata āha---astu veti /
GK16visa10cu:5495: “calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ spṛśasi bahuśo vepathumatī rahasyākhyāyīva svanasi mṛdu karṇāntikacaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5496: karaṃ vyādhunvatyāḥ pibasi ratisarvasvamadharaṃ vayaṃ tattvānveṣānmadhukara hatāstvaṃ khalu kṛtī” //
GK16visa10cu:5499: iti māghe copamānabhūtatayā madhukararajasoḥ kṛtipadavarapadābhyāmevādhikyasyoktatvāt kāvyaprakāśasya matamatrānupādeyameva /
GK16visa10cu:5501: (lo, ai) hanūmadādyairityādi damayantī prati devadūtasya nalasya vacanam /
GK16visa10cu:5502: dviṣāṃ hasairdūtatvaṃ parityajya svayaṃ nāyakatvapratigrahāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5504: sahārthasya balādekaṃ yatra syādvācakaṃ dvayoḥ // VisSd_10.54 //
GK16visa10cu:5523: naca bhedādhyavasāyasyaiva atiśayoktitvena sā kathaṃ tanmūleti vācyam,
GK16visa10cu:5532: atra tṛtīyāntapadārthe 'dharadale prathamāntapadārthe priye ca rāgavānitipadam abhedena svārthabodhakam;
GK16visa10cu:5544: kiñcātrodāharaṇe abhedādhyavasāyo 'pi kāryyakāraṇaikakālīnatāsaṃpṛktaḥ adharadalasya rāgabhajanānantarameva priyasya ragadarśanāt;
GK16visa10cu:5547: yaduktaṃ rāghavānandaiḥ--“eko 'pi dharma āropamāśritya sahārthabalādanyadharmaṇyapi sambaddhaścettadā sahoktiriti,
GK16visa10cu:5573: agamat saha tailabindunā nanu dīpārciriva kṣitestalam” //
GK16visa10cu:5577: gurusammohaviluptacetanā sā indumatī narādhipena ajena samameva kṣitestalaṃ pṛṣṭham agamat /
GK16visa10cu:5579: atra narādhipo 'pi kṣitestalamagamaditi sahārthasya samaṃ padabalād bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:5589: evaṃ ca yadyapi śobhanatva eva paryavasānaṃ tathāpyaśobhanatvābhāvamukhena śobhanavacanasyāyamabhiprāyo yatkasyacidvarṇanīyasyāśobhanatvaṃ tatparasannidhereva doṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5599: (lo, a) śobhana eva paryavasānam “abhāvasya tu yo 'bhāvo bhāva evāvaśiṣyate';
GK16visa10cu:5609: atra jaladakālādeva candro malino grīṣmarttau ca vanarājiramañjuriti pratīteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5617: kā dinaśrīrvinārkeṇa kā niśā śaśinā vinā” //
GK16visa10cu:5626: “nirarthakaṃ janma gataṃ nalinyā yayā na dṛṣṭaṃ tuhināṃśubimbam /
GK16visa10cu:5627: utpattirindorapi niṣphalaiva dṛṣṭā vinidrā nalinī na yena” //
GK16visa10cu:5633: evaṃ sahoktirapi sahaśabdaprayogābhāve 'pi sahārthavivakṣāyāṃ bhavatīti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:5646: kāntayā śūnyamālokya kasya ceto na dūyate” //
GK16visa10cu:5654: anyasya aprastutasya vastuno vyavahārasya arthād vyaṅgyasya prastute vastuni samāropa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5655: tad vyañjanaṃ ca samaiḥ prastutāprastutasamānaiḥ kāryaliṅgaviśeṣaṇairityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5658: samaistulyairvyavahārasya kṛtasya na tu rūpakavat svātmanaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5672: yathā vā mama---“ullāsya lāsyanilayaṃ vipuloruyugmaṃ protkṣipya bāhulatikāmatikāntagātryaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5673: yaṃ sābhilāṣamanasaḥ pramadā bhajante puṇyātmane śiśirapāvana te namo 'stu //
GK16visa10cu:5676: (lo, ṛ) vyādhūyetyatra gandhavāhe haṭhakāmukavyavahārasamārope liṅgasāmyasyāpi prayojakatve vasanavyādhūnanādikāryasāmyaprādhānyādanyodāharaṇam /
GK16visa10cu:5678: kāryyaliṅgaviśeṣaṇānāṃ kvacid dvayoḥ kvacitttrayāṇāṃ vā samāveśe 'pi bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:5682: anākramya jagatkṛtsnaṃ no sandhyāṃ bhajate raviḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:5713: jaraṭhalavalīpāṇḍucchāyo bhṛśaṃ kaluṣāntaraḥ śrayati haritaṃ hanta /
GK16visa10cu:5721_0: aindrīṃ diśaṃ dinakarakaraspṛṣṭāṃ puraḥ sammukhe nirīkṣya jaraṭhasya kaṭhinasya lavalīphalasyeva
GK16visa10cu:5721_1: pāṇḍucchāyaḥ san tuhinadyutiḥ kaluṣāntaraḥ kalaṅkamalināntaraḥ prāyetasīṃ pratīcīṃ haritaṃ śrayati /
GK16visa10cu:5722: lavalīphalasya paktatve sati kāṭhinyaṃ pāṇḍuratvaṃ ca /
GK16visa10cu:5729: svākrāntāṃ diśaṃ virodhinā'krāntāṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥ khena pāṇḍuraḥsan digantaramāśrayatīti vākyārthabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5731_0: tathā hi---svanāyikāṃ smeramukhīm anurāgeṇa galitāṅgāvaraṇāṃ kareṇa spṛśantaṃ paranāyakaṃ
GK16visa10cu:5731_1: dṛṣṭvā duḥ khāt pāṇḍuracchāyo nāyakastāṃ tyaktvā nāyikāntaramāśrayatītyevaṃ vyavahārasya
GK16visa10cu:5740: atraiva hi “timirāvṛtim” ityatra “timirāśukam” iti pāṭhe etadeśasya rūpaṇe 'pi samāsoktireva,
GK16visa10cu:5742: tatra hi timirāṃśukayo rūpyarūpakabhāvo dvayorāvarakatvena sphuṭasādṛśyatayā parasācivyamanapekṣyāpi svamātraviśrānta iti na samāsoktibuddhiṃ vyāhantumīśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5746: parasya śabdārthasya vā ropaṇasya sācivyaṃ sāhāyyam /
GK16visa10cu:5749: yatra tu rūpyarūpakayoḥ sādṛśyamasphuṭaṃ tatraikadeśāntararūpaṇaṃ vinā tadasaṅgataṃ syādityaśābdamapyekadeśāntararūpaṇamārthamapekṣata eveti tatraikadeśavivartirūpakameva /
GK16visa10cu:5757: na tu svasya sphuṭasādṛśyāttatraiva vācyarūpakāntarasya ākṣepatvena ekadeśavivarttirūpakam /
GK16visa10cu:5759: prakṛte tu aṃśukatimirayoḥ sphuṭasādṛśyādārtharūpakanirapekṣaḥ svato rūpyarūpakābhāva ityato naikadeśavivarttitetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5766: ragasaṃmuhī vi sahasā parammuhī hoi riuseṇā” //
GK16visa10cu:5779: raṇa eva antaḥ puraṃ tatra strīliṅgaśabdārthatvena maṇḍalāgralatayā rūpyamāṇanāyikāvyañjanāt /
GK16visa10cu:5781: tadbhraṣṭāyāṃ ripusenāyāmapi strīliṅgaśabdārthatvena rūpyamāṇa pratināyikā vyaṅgyā atra raṇe 'ntaḥ--purarūpaṇamekadeśavivartti /
GK16visa10cu:5783: (lo, ai) tarhi kaḥ punarekadeśavivarttirūpakasya viṣaya ityāśaṅkyāha---tatra tviti /
GK16visa10cu:5785: ityādau raṇāntaḥ purādikayo rūpyarūpakayorekadeśāntararūpaṇaṃ maṇḍalāgralatādiṣu rājanāyikātvādyāropaṃ vināsphuṭameva /
GK16visa10cu:5791: kvacicca yatra sphuṭasādṛśyānāmapi bahūnāṃ rūpaṇaṃ śābdamekadeśasya cārthaṃ tatraikadeśavivarti rūpakameva /
GK16visa10cu:5798: tatra lāvaṇyamadhuno mādhuryasya upādeyatvaparyyavasannasya sādṛśyasya locanabhramarayośca cāñcalyarūpasādṛśyasya sphuṭatvādityata āha---yatreti /
GK16visa10cu:5806: (vi, ta) nanu sphuṭasādṛśyādīnāṃ vahutve ekadeśavivarttitvamityatra kā yuktirityatra āha---rūpakapratīteriti /
GK16visa10cu:5807: vyāpitayā bahutvena tasyāśca bahutvavaśāt prathamotpannatvo samāsoktivirodhakatvam /
GK16visa10cu:5811: nanvasti raṇāntaḥ purayorapi sukhasaṃcāratayā sphuṭaṃ sādṛśyamiti cet?
GK16visa10cu:5823: nṛpadarśanād ripusenāparāṅmukhatvaṃ pratyarthatātparyyālocanena rājñaḥ śūratvasya tato raṇe 'bhītatvasya ca lābhena tata eva sukhasañcāralābha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5825: nahi mukhacandrayormanoharatvamiva rājño raṇe bhītatvabuddhiṃ vinā pratyakṣādinā sukhasañcāratvaṃ gamyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5826: atra raṇāntaḥ purayoriti sañcārālābhādityatra sañcāratvābhāvāditi kvacit prāmādika eva pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5835: tatpakṣe ca nisargasiddhamukhasaurabheṇodbhrānto bhṛṅgo yasyāstādṛśī cāsau saṅgītaśālinī ceti samāsaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5837: vāsaraṃ gṛhaṃ tadadhīśe gṛhapatau udite ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5842: atra nisargetyādiviśeṣaṇasāmyātsarojinyāṃ nāyikāvyavahārapratītau strīmātragāminaḥ smeratvadharmasya samāropaḥ kāraṇam /
GK16visa10cu:5875: anantaraṃ ca dantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpaiścitetyādisamāsāntarāśrayeṇa samānaviśeṣaṇamahātmyāddhariṇekṣaṇāyāṃ latāvyavahārapratītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5879: atra dantaprabhāḥ puṣpāṇīva ityādirītyā sarvatra puruṣavyāghrāditvādupamāsamāsaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5882: tathā hi---“upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ sāmānyāprayoge” iti pāṇinyanuśāsanenasādhāraṇadharmāprayoge rūpakasamāsabādhād upamāsamāsasyaiva vyavasthāpanādityekaṃ bādhakam /
GK16visa10cu:5888: puṣpādibhinnaiḥ taiḥ suveṣapratītirna ghaṭate ityataḥ prathamaṃ dantaprabhādiviśeṣyake vyāghrādisamāsa evetyāha---upamāgarbhatveneti /
GK16visa10cu:5891: ayamarthaḥ---sakṛduccaritaiḥ śabdairasakṛcchaktilakṣaṇābhyāṃ bodhāsambhavāddarśito 'yaṃ puṣpādiviśeṣyaka upamāsamāsārtho vyaṅgya eva /
GK16visa10cu:5893: suveṣatvopapattikatvaṃ ca samāsadvayatātparyagrāhakaṃ tena ca suveṣatvepapattau upapattimāha---samānaviśeṣaṇamāhātmyāditi /
GK16visa10cu:5899: taddhi nāyikāyāṃ mukhyaṃ natu latāyāmiti nāyikādharmiṇāmeva dantaprabhādīnāmupameyaprayojakaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:5902: anyathā dāse kṛtāgasītyādāvapi prācīnaprasiddhe 'pi rūpakasamāsaviṣaye upāttanāyikānuguṇyena pulakāṅkurakaṇṭakāgrairityatra upamāsamāsa eva syāt /
GK16visa10cu:5912: yatra viśeṣe tu na svīkāra ityagre vyaktirbhaviṣyati /
GK16visa10cu:5916: āsyasyaivātra pānamuktaṃ tasya cobhayathāpi pānāsambhava iti na vācyam,
GK16visa10cu:5927: suveṣatvasya nijadharmeṇāsambhavāttatsattve kramaśaḥ samāsadvayenaivopapattirdarśitetyatastatra na rūpakopamāyāḥ sandehasaṅkaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5928: parīteti pāṭhe tu parītatvaṃ vyāptiḥ puṣpairlāvaṇyaiḥ sambhavatītyatra samāsadvayenopamārūpakayorbhavatyeva sandeha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5929: naca sāmānyadharmāprayogavaśādupamā rūpakaṃ bādhata iti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:5937: tadvattve lāvaṇyamadhubhiḥ pūrṇamityekadeśavivarttirūpakodāharaṇe 'pi samāsoktitvamidaṃ darśitaṃ sāmpradāyikamatānusāreṇaiva /
GK16visa10cu:5940: parītatvasya hariṇekṣaṇāyāṃ latāyāṃ ca sādhāraṇyenaiva pravṛtteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5947: eṣu ca yaṣāṃ mate upamāsaṅkarayorekadeśavivartitā nāsti tanmate ādyatṛtīyayoḥ samāsoktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5953: tatra prathamaṃ rūpakasamāsabādhasyādarśitatvātteṣāṃ mataṃ darśayati---eṣu ceti /
GK16visa10cu:5956: tadevaṃ dvitīyo lāvaṇyamadhubhairityādyukto rūpakaviṣaya eva na samāsoktiviṣayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5957: vyaṅgyarūpakaṃ mukhasya padmatvaṃ taddharmalāvaṇyādau madhvādirūpakaṃ vācyamityekadeśavivarttisuveṣatvaviśeṣaṇavati dantaprabhetyādau /
GK16visa10cu:5962: (vi, ma) paryālocane tu na samāsoktirnāpyekadeśavivarttirūpakaṃ kintvekadeśavivarttyupamaiva iti svamataṃ granthakṛdāha---paryālocane tviti /
GK16visa10cu:5966: viśeṣaṇasāmye yatsamāsoktirityuktaṃ tatra viśeṣaṇasya sādhāraṇatvaṃ śliṣṭatvaṃ ceti /
GK16visa10cu:5969: tatra dantaprabhāpuṣpamivetyupamāsamāsabodhe hariṇekṣaṇā late veti bodhasya samāsadvayakusṛṣṭikalpanaṃ vinaivopapattirityevaṃ paryālocanā /
GK16visa10cu:5973: (lo, ū) iha caupamyagarbhasyaivaṃ traividhyasambhave 'pi dvitīyodāharaṇam ekadeśavivarttirūpakaviṣaya eveti na pūrvottaravirodha ityāha---eṣu ceti /
GK16visa10cu:5978: paryālocane tattvato vivecane ucitā hariṇekṣaṇa lateveti pratīteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5992: pāṇḍunā payodhareṇa aupamyenārdranakhakṣatābham aindraṃ dhanuḥ dadhānā sakalaṅkaminduṃ prasādayantī prasannaṃ nirmalaṃ kurvatī śaradraveratyadhikaṃ tāpaṃ tatānetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5994_0: atra pāṇḍupayodhareṇa gaurastanenārdranakhakṣataṃ dadhānāyāḥ paranāyikāyā gantṛtvena
GK16visa10cu:5994_2: samāsoktyā pratītiḥ tadvyavahārasya ca śaradi pratītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6015: (vi, la) upamāgarbhasamāsoktyaṅgīkāre tadrarbhatve ca samāsadvayaniyame sā kathaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6016_1: ca aindre dhanuṣi ārdranakhakṣatatulyatvāprāptau nāyikāyāṃ ca viśeṣaṇābhāvena tadviśeṣaṇasya
GK16visa10cu:6018: kintvatra payodharasya prasādayantīti padasya sakalaṅkapadasya tāpapadasya ca śliṣṭaviśeṣaṇikā samāsoktireveyam /
GK16visa10cu:6021: nanu “ārdranakhakṣatābham” ityatra sthitamapyupamānatvaṃ vastuparyālocanayā aindre dhanuṣi sañcāraṇīyam /
GK16visa10cu:6029: tathā ca tatkṣatadhāraṇaṃ stanasya sambhavatyeva ityata upamāgarbhasamāsoktirevātrāpīti kathamupamāgarbhasamāsoktivilopa ityāśaṅkate---nanviti /
GK16visa10cu:6038: yathā--“dadhnā juhoti” ityādau havanasyānyathāsiddherdadhni sañcāryate vidhiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6043: (vi, śa) śabdenaikatra bodhitārthasyānyatra sañcāre dṛṣṭāntamāha--yathā dadhneti /
GK16visa10cu:6046: iti vākyarūpād anyataḥ siddheḥ siddhasya ca vidheyatvāsambhavaparyālocanayā tadeva vidheyatvaṃ yattvasiddham /
GK16visa10cu:6049: tathā caivaṃ rītyā dhanurupameyanakhakṣatadhāraṇaṃ payodhare sambhavati,
GK16visa10cu:6058_0: atra hi hotavyamityarthe juhotinā yadyapi homavidhānopadeśaḥ pratīyate tathāpi vākyāntaralabhye
GK16visa10cu:6058_1: tasmin “aprāpte hi śāstramarthavadi” ti nayena piṣṭapeṣaṇavadupadeśavaiyarthyādatrānukta
GK16visa10cu:6065: ārdranakhakṣatābhamityatrārdranakhakṣatasambandhād ābhāśabdasyārthasya aupamyasya ca tatparityāgena sambaddhe indradhanuṣi sañcāraṇe dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayorvaiṣamyamityanirvāhāt;
GK16visa10cu:6066: yathā kathañcinnarvāhe vā na svārasikīti kaṣṭā yā sañcāraṇasṛṣṭiḥ tasyāḥ kalpanādasyotpādānād jyāyastvādanāyasasiddhatvena /
GK16visa10cu:6068: aindraṃ dhanurityādau mukhyatayā varttamānasya upamāmātre viśeṣeṇa samāsoktyuddīpakasya prasādanakriyādeḥ sadbhāvaḥ;
GK16visa10cu:6076: ekadeśavivartyupamā tu prācīnairanuktāpyudāharaṇe 'dṛṣṭā nāṅgīkarttavyetyata udāharaṇe dṛṣṭatvaṃ darśayitumāha--astu veti /
GK16visa10cu:6079: pade pade vibhānti sma cakravākaiḥ stanairiva //
GK16visa10cu:6083: na cātrāpyutpalairiva netrairityupamānopameyabhāvavaiparītyaṃ sañcāryyatāṃ kathaṃ gatyantarabhāva iti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:6084: tadā saraḥ śrīṣu netrādibodhāt saraḥ śriya iva nāyikā iti paryavasāne prakrāntasaraḥ śrīvarṇanābhāvāpatteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6086: kiṃ copamāyāṃ vyavahārapratīterabhāvātkathaṃ tadupajīvikāyāḥ samāsokteḥ praveśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6090: (vi, sa) nanvevaṃ “dantaprabhe” tyatra upamāgarbhasamāsoktirnetrairivotpalairityatraikadeśavivartyupamā iti kathamupamāgarbhasamāsoktivilopa ityata āha---kiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:6093: yatpunaruktaṃ rāghavānandaiḥ saraḥ śrīniṣṭhaṃ liṅgasāmyaṃ samāsoktiprayojakamiti;
GK16visa10cu:6097: kintu prastutamapekṣyaiva samāsoktiḥ kriyate iti svayamanantaramevoktam /
GK16visa10cu:6099: samanakāryaliṅgaviśeṣaṇānāṃ lakṣyeṣu dvayoḥ trayāṇaāṃ vā sadbhāve prādhānyena vyavahāra iti /
GK16visa10cu:6103: kiñcaivaṃ “mukhena kamaleneva vibhāti hariṇekṣaṇā“ityādāvapi hariṇekṣaṇāyāṃ nalinīvyavahārasamāropeṇa samāsoktyutprekṣayoḥ samaveśaḥ syāt /
GK16visa10cu:6111: aindraṃ dhanurityādau upamānopameyabhāvavaiparītyasañcāraṇokteḥ kaṣṭasṛṣṭikakalpanārūpaṃ dūṣaṇamuktvā aupamyagarbhasamāsoktyaṅgīkāre dūṣaṇāntaraṃ dadata itīyaṃ kārikā /
GK16visa10cu:6113: yad yasmāt kāvyaliṅgādisāmyahetukasamāsoktau yathāvyavahārasamāropaḥ pratīyate tadvadaupamyagarbhatvamamuṣmānna pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:6115: kintu tādṛśe sthale ekadeśopamā ekadeśavivartyupamaiva sphuṭetyarthaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:6662: na tatra vācyasya vyavahārasya vyaṅgyapuruṣādau samāropasya prāṇatvācca tatkārakatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6666: vācyor'tho 'prastutastatrāpyeva masyāḥ prasaktirevaṃ samādhānaṃ ca bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:6667: upamādhvanau samāsoktau śabdaśleṣālaṅkāre tasyāḥ prasaktireva nāstītyāha---upamādhvanāviti /
GK16visa10cu:6669: upamādhvanisamāsoktau cāprastuto vyaṅgya eveti tayornāsyāḥ prasaktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6676: tathāhi “bhuktimuktikṛdekānta” ityādau yadāgama ityatra sacchāstre na sata āgamanarūpasyārthasya vyavahāraḥ samāropyate,
GK16visa10cu:6688: nindayā stutergamyatve vyājena stutiriti vyutpattyā vyājastutiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6694: yadyapi bakṣyamāṇodāharaṇayornindāstutyorekasyāpi vācyatvaṃ tathāpi nindāstutiprayojakārthābhyāṃ vācyābhyāmityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6695: gamyatve vyaṅgyatve nindāvyājena stutau vyājanindātvena vyājastutiparayogārthasambhavāt samāsadvayenobhayatra tatpadārthaṃ ghaṭayati---nindayeti /
GK16visa10cu:6699: tvayi kupite 'pi prāgiva viśvastā dviṭstriyo jātāḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:6703: he deva tāḥ prasiddhāḥ tava vairistriyaḥ tvayi kupite prāgiva viśvastāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6706_0: akopadaśāyāṃ dṛṣṭatvena kaṇṭakairvyāptāṅgayaṣṭayaḥ kopadaśāyāṃ tu bhayena kaṇṭakavanapraveśāttādṛśāstathākopadaśāyāṃ
GK16visa10cu:6706_1: viśvastā abhītā kopadaśāyāṃ tu viśiṣṭamadhikaṃ śvastaṃ śvāso yāsāṃ tādṛśāḥ,
GK16visa10cu:6724: he payoda / yajjagataḥ jīvanāya tava jīvanāni jalāni iyaṃ tava mayā vyājastutirmirthyāstutirevoditā /
GK16visa10cu:6727_0: he ghana / yat pathikāni virahaṇo nihatya dharmarājasya yamasya sāhāyyaṃ mahimānamarjayasi
GK16visa10cu:6727_1: idaṃ tu te mahatstotraṃ dharmarājasya tulyakarma lokamāraṇakāritvena māhātmyādhikyāttadviruddhajagajjīvakāritve,
GK16visa10cu:6730: atra stutervācyatve 'pi stutiprayojakārthaparatayā yatstutipadaṃ vyākhyātaṃ tadudāharaṇāntarasaṃgrahāya /
GK16visa10cu:6731: yathā “dānāt praśaṃsāṃ prāpto 'si karṇedānīṃ tu saṃgarāt /
GK16visa10cu:6732: apakramya yaśo dattvāraye prāptastato 'dhikā“miti karṇaṃ prati aśvatthāmna uktau stuteravācyatā /
GK16visa10cu:6742: gamyaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ tacca prastutasya kāraṇarūpaṃ bodhyam bhaṅgyā prastutamapi kāryakathanarūpaṃ bhaṅgyabhidhīyate pratipādyate /
GK16visa10cu:6745: prastutakāryeṇa prastutaṃ kāraṇaṃ yadā vyajyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6746: kāraṇavyañjakakāryarūpāyāmaprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ tu aprastutena kāryeṇa prastutaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyajyate iti bhedo vakṣyate yathā “indurlipta ivāñjanena” ityādau /
GK16visa10cu:6749: bhaṅgyā camatkāranipuṇavicchittyantarāśrayeṇa vyaṅgyam abhidhīyate bodhyate kāryādidvāreṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6754: atra hayagrīveṇa svargo vijita iti prastutameva gamyaṃ kāraṇaṃ vaicitryaviśeṣapratipattaye sainyasya pārijātamañjarīsāvajñasparśanarūpakāryadvāreṇābhihitam /
GK16visa10cu:6758: śacyāḥ keśasambhogalālitāstāḥ prasiddhāḥ pārijātasya mañjaryo yasya iyagrīvasya nṛpasya sainikairnandane vane sāvajñaṃ spṛṣṭā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6760: gamyaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ kāraṇarūpaṃ sāvatramañjarīsparśasya abhihitaṃ vyañjanayā pratipāditam /
GK16visa10cu:6770: ityatra madamānayorvināśa eva tayornivāsaprītiparityāga iti paryāyoktam /
GK16visa10cu:6771: evaṃ ca yadeva gamyate tasyaivābhidhāne paryāyoktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6772: taduktaṃ kāvyaprakāśakṛtā “yadevocyate tadeva vyaṅgyaṃ yathā tu vyaṅgyaṃ na tathā ucyate” iti paryāyoktalakṣaṇavyākhyāne /
GK16visa10cu:6773: ayaṃ ca kvacitkāraṇena vācyena kāryasya gamyatve 'pi sambhavati /
GK16visa10cu:6777: iha tu varṇanīyasya prabhāvātiśayabodhakatvena kāryamiti kāraṇavatprastutam /
GK16visa10cu:6783: (vi, va) ślokāntareṇāpi prastutakāryeṇa prastutakāraṇavyañjanādidānīmalaṅkāraṃ darśayati---evaṃ ceti /
GK16visa10cu:6785_0: anena rājñā śatruvilāsinīnāṃ staneṣu muktāphalavat sthūlatamān aśrubindūn paryāsayatā
GK16visa10cu:6785_1: pātayatā ākṣepasūtreṇa grathanasūtreṇavinaiva hārāḥ pratyarpitāḥ aśrubindava eva
GK16visa10cu:6787: atra varṇanīyasya rājño gamyabhūtaśatrumāraṇarūpakāraṇavatkāryabhūtaṃ tathāvidhaśatrustrīkrandanajalamapi prabhāvātiśayabodhakatvena varṇanārhamiti paryāyoktameva /
GK16visa10cu:6788: “rājan rājasutā na pāṭhayati māṃ devyo 'pi tūṣṇīṃ sthitāḥ kubje bhojaya māṃ kumārasacivairnādyāpi kiṃ bhujyate /
GK16visa10cu:6789: itthaṃ rājaśukastavāribhavane mukto 'dhvagaiḥ pañjarā- ccitrasthānavalokya śūnyavalabhāvekaikamābhāṣate” //
GK16visa10cu:6792: (vi, śa) aprastutakāryeṇa prastutakāraṇavyañjanarūpāyā aprastutapraśaṃsāyā udāharaṇaṃ “rājan rājasutā ityādika “kāvyaprakāśakṛtā dattam;
GK16visa10cu:6797: atau'dhvagaiḥ pañjarānmukto rājaśukastadīyaśūnyavacbhau citralikhitān rājādīnavalokya ekaikamitthamābhāṣata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6799: devya iti sambodhanaṃ yūyamapi tūṣṇīṃ sthitā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6807: atra prasthānedyataṃ bhavantaṃ śrutvā sahasaivārayaḥ palāyitā iti kāraṇaṃ prastutam /
GK16visa10cu:6809: anye tu--“rājaśukavṛttāntena ko 'pi prastutaprabhāvo bodhyata ityaprastutapraśaṃsaiva” ityāhuḥ,
GK16visa10cu:6812: (vi, ṣa) keṣāñcinmate atrāripalāyanarūpaprastutakāraṇasya kāryaṃ śukabhāṣaṇaprastutameveti taddarśayati---atreti /
GK16visa10cu:6820: sāmānyaṃ vā viśeṣaṇa viśeṣastena vā yadi /
GK16visa10cu:6821: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇenedaṃ kāryeṇa ca samarthyate // VisSd_10.61 //
GK16visa10cu:6829: evaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇena kāraṇaṃ vā kāryeṇa samarthyate ucitatvena pratipādyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6830: uktaṃ yat sāmānyaṃ tadviśeṣe tathātvadarśanāducitamiti bodhanaṃ samarthanarītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6831: iti caturvidhaṃ samarthanaṃ samarthyasamarthakayoḥ sādharmyeṇa tayoḥ parasparavaidharmyarūpeṇetareṇa vetyāto 'ṣṭadhetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6836: atra dvitīyārdhagatena viśeṣarūpeṇārthena prathamārdhagataḥ sāmānyor'thaḥ sopapattikaḥ kriyate /
GK16visa10cu:6839: (vi, ha) tatra sāmānyasya viśeṣeṇa samarthanaṃ sādharmyeṇāha---bṛhaditi /
GK16visa10cu:6850_0: yadyapi kṣudrasāmānyasya nedṛśaṃ samarthanamucitamityapratīteḥ tathāpi kāryāntagamanaviśiṣṭasya
GK16visa10cu:6850_1: tasya tat samarthanaṃ viśeṣaṇāṃśamādāyeti bodhyaṃ saviśeṣaṇe vidhiniṣedhāviti nyāyāt /
GK16visa10cu:6852: atra ca kṣudraviśeṣasya nagāpagāyāḥ kāryāntagāmitvadarśanāt kṣudrasāmānyasya kāryāntagāmitvamaucityena sambhavatīti pratītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6872: kuruta tatnitaye didhīrṣāṃ āryaḥ karoti harakārmukamātatajyam” //
GK16visa10cu:6873: atra kāraṇabhūtaṃ harakārmukātatajyīkaraṇaṃ pṛthivīsthairyādeḥ kāryasya samarthakam /
GK16visa10cu:6880: āryo rāmo harakārbhukamātatajyaṃ yataḥ karoti tataḥ kāraṇāt pṛthvyādikaṃ sthirādikaṃ bhavetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6885: anyathā tu ātatajyīkaraṇe yāvān bharaḥ syāttena sarveṣāmasthairyaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6887: naca pṛthvīsthairyādeḥ kathamātatajyīkaraṇasya kāryatvamasthairyādereva tatkāryatvāditi vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:6889: nacaivamātatajyīkaraṇātpūrvabhūtasya viśeṣasthairyādestatrāpi kathaṃ kāryatvamiti vācyamtajjñānakāryatve ca tatkāryatvopacārāt nāndīmukhasya vivāhanimittakatvavat /
GK16visa10cu:6891: tādṛśāt krāraṇāt pṛthvyādeḥ sthirībhavanādikamucitamityevaṃ samarthanaṃ sthirībhāvādyupadeśa eka kāryam /
GK16visa10cu:6893: kāryādisamarthanacatuṣkaṃ hetvalaṅkārarūpasyaivetyataḥ kāvyaprakāśakṛtā tadupekṣya cāturvidhyamevārthāntaranyāsoktaṃ kāraṇasya janakahetutvāt kāryasya ca jñāpakahetutvāt,
GK16visa10cu:6896: “sahasā vidadhīta na kriyām” ityādau sampadvaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ sahasā vidhānābhāvasya vimṛśyakāritvarūpasya kāraṇasya samarthakam /
GK16visa10cu:6901: sahasā vimarṣaṇaṃ vinā kriyāṃ na vidadhīta,
GK16visa10cu:6903: vimṛśyakāritve tu na kevalaṃ nāpadaḥ kintu sampadaścetyāha---vṛṇate hīti /
GK16visa10cu:6914: (vi, gha) viśeṣeṇa sāmānyasya samarthanaṃ vaidharmyaiṇetyasyodāharaṇamūhyamiti vakṣyate /
GK16visa10cu:6924: “sahasā vidadhīta-” ityatra sahasā vidhānābhāvasyāpatpradatvaṃ viruddhaṃ kāryaṃ samarthakam /
GK16visa10cu:6929: atastadanuktvā kāryeṇa kāraṇasamarthanaṃ vaidharmyeṇetyasyāpyudāharaṇaṃ sahas vidadhītetyatraivetyāha---sahaseti /
GK16visa10cu:6935: atra hi vimṛṣyakāriṇa eva sampadāvaraṇāt kāryāt sahasā vidhānābhāva ucita iti pratītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6937: viśeṣaṇasāmānyasamarthanaṃ kāraṇena kāryasamarthanañca vaidharmyeṇa yadanudāhṛtaṃ tadityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6938: tatra viśeṣeṇa sāmānyasamarthanaṃ vaidharmyeṇa yathā--- “guṇaānābheva daurātmyāddhuri dhūryo na yujyate /
GK16visa10cu:6941: asyārthaḥ--dhūryaḥ āropyamāṇabhāravahanasamarthaśca prāṇī dhuri bhāravahane niyujyate /
GK16visa10cu:6942: tacca guṇānāmeva daurātmyād daurjanyād dhūryatvaguṇasya bhāravahanaduḥ khaprayojakatvāttasya daurjanyam /
GK16visa10cu:6943: guṇābhāve tu tādṛśaṃ duḥ khaṃ na bhavatītyāha--asaṃjāteti /
GK16visa10cu:6948: aniyujyamānaprāṇiviśeṣeṇa galigavādiyujyamānatvaviruddhadharmeṇa sukhasvāpena dhūryaviruddhadharmeṇa galitvena ca samarthitam /
GK16visa10cu:6949: alasasya sukhasvapanaśīlasya dhūryasya dhuri niyujyamānatvamucitamiti pratīteḥ niyogasamarthanameva niyujyamānadhūryasamarthanaṃ;
GK16visa10cu:6951: kāraṇena kāryasamarthanaṃ vaidharmyeṇa yathā--- “sa vijigye raṇe sarvān rākṣasendro baloddhataḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6954: atra hi rāvaṇasya vijayaḥ kāryaṃ rāmabāṇakaṭusvādānāsvādena kāraṇena samarthitam /
GK16visa10cu:6955: tadanāsvādena tasya vijaya ucitastadāsvāde sati tadasambhavāditi pratiteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6968: ye 'pi tvadramanānukārigatayaste rājahaṃsā gatā- stvatsādṛśyavinodamātramapi me daivena na kṣamyate” //
GK16visa10cu:6973: varṣāsu bhāvanopanītāṃ rāvaṇopahṛtāṃ sītāṃ sambodhya rāmasyeyamuktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6974: he priye / tvatsādṛśyenārthād dṛśyamānena yo vinodastanmātramapi me daivena na kṣamyate /
GK16visa10cu:6981: vākyatrayasyaiva kriyākārakabhāvena samāptatvād hetava ityatra hetvarthakā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6985: na dhatte śirasā gaṅgāṃ bhūribhārabhiyā haraḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7002: atra paśyantītyasaṃkhyapathgāmiti tvaddānajalavāhinīmiti ca padādeva kriyānanvayenāsamāptatvāt pathatrayagamanāpekṣayā asaṃkhyāpathagamanoktarṣeṇa taddarśanaṃ gopanahetuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7004: iha kecid vākyārthagatena kāvyaliṅgenaiva gatārthatayā kāryakāraṇabhāver'thāntaranyāsaṃ nādriyante /
GK16visa10cu:7006: tathā hyatra hetustridhā bhavati--jñāpako niṣpādakaḥ samarthakaśceti /
GK16visa10cu:7015: kāryakaraṇasamarthena yānyudāharaṇāni darśitāni tatra hetūnāṃ vākyārthamātragatatvāj jñāpako 'numānasya viṣaya iti /
GK16visa10cu:7016: idaṃ tu kāvyaprakāśakṛdviṣayavibhāgamanādṛtyaiva likhitaṃ tanmate hi praśrasyaiva jñāpako heturna hetvalaṅkāraḥ,
GK16visa10cu:7018: anyatra tu janako jñāpakaśca heturhetvalaṅkāra eva /
GK16visa10cu:7019: ata eva--- “bhasmoddhūlana bhadramastu bhavate rudrākṣamāle śubhaṃ hā sopānaparamparāṃ girisutākāntālayālaṅkṛtim /
GK16visa10cu:7020: adyārādhanatoṣitena vibhunā yuṣmatsaparyāsukhā- llokocchedini mokṣanāmani mahāmohe nidhīyāmahe” //
GK16visa10cu:7021: iti śloke sukhālokaccheditvaṃ mokṣasya mahāmohatve heturityuktyā hetvalaṅkārodāharaṇatayā udāhṛtam /
GK16visa10cu:7022: tatra mokṣasya mahāmohatāyā alīkatvena sukhālokaccheditvasya janakahetutvāsambhavena jñāpakahetutvādeva /
GK16visa10cu:7023: anumānaṃ tu sādhyasādhanayorekadharmigatatvena nirdeśe sati hetorhetutvena nirdeśe satyeva /
GK16visa10cu:7024: iha tu sukhālokācchedinītyanena hetoreva nirdeśo natu hetutvena /
GK16visa10cu:7025: bhavatāpyanumānodāharaṇatayā vakṣyamāṇeṣu ślokeṣu hetūnāṃ hetutvenaiva nirdeśāt nahi “parvāto vahnimān dhūmāt ';
GK16visa10cu:7036: anyathā sākāṅkṣatayāsamañjasameva syāt iti pādatrayagatavākyaṃ niṣpādakatvenāpekṣate /
GK16visa10cu:7039: (vi, ṭa) yattvannaitrasamānakāntītyuktahetvalaṅkārodāharaṇe daivākṣamāṃ prati nīlotpalādīnāṃ salilamagnatvāderjanakahetutvāsambhavāt kaṣṭasṛṣṭyā janakatvamupapādayitumāha /
GK16visa10cu:7055: ityādivadupadeśamātreṇāpi nirākāṅkṣatayā svato 'pi gatārthaṃ sahasā vidhānābhāvaṃ sampadvaraṇaṃ sopapattikameva karotīti pṛthageva kāryakāraṇabhāver'thāntaranyāsaḥ kāvyaliṅgāt /
GK16visa10cu:7060: ityādipadārdhaṃ vinā pūrvārdhavākyaṃ sākāṅkṣamityata uktarityā tatrāpi kāvyaliṅgameva syānnārthantaranyāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7062: upadeśamātreṇāpi nirākāṅkṣatayā vṛṇate hi ityādāvākāṅkṣārāhityenāpi gatārthaṃ caritārthamityataḥ sahasā vidhānābhāvaṃ karmabhūtaṃ sampadvaraṇaṃ karttṛ sopapatikameva kurute /
GK16visa10cu:7068: parāpakāretyādau samarthanīyānirdeśāt nāstyeva tatrārthāntaranyāsa iti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7070: pṛthvi sthirā bhavetyādau siddhe sthairye upadeśasambhavāt kārmukajyātatīkaraṇaṃ hetumapekṣate eveti tatra hetvalaṅkāraprasaktirdurvāraiva /
GK16visa10cu:7078: (vi, ḍa) yatra janakahetorhetutvenaiva nirdeśastatra vaicitryābhāvānna hetvalaṅkāra ityāha--ni dhatta ityādi /
GK16visa10cu:7085: yathā “yatra patatyabalānā” mityādau śarāpātena madanadhāvanasyāniṣpādakaḥ sākāṅkṣatvena siddhasya sādhakaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7087: anyathā yattvannetra ityādi pādatrayaṃ vināsamañjasaṃ syāt tadaivāsya virahiṇo nāyikāsādṛśyavinodāsahatvasya svato 'pratīteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7093: idañca kāvyaliṅgasya heturvaicitaryāvahanena na nivarttata iti kāvyaliṅgākhyamalaṅkaraṇam /
GK16visa10cu:7095: anumānaṃ tu vicchittyā jñānaṃ sādhyasya sādhanāt /
GK16visa10cu:7102: atra sādhyasādhanayoreva dharmigatatvaṃ kāvyaprakāśakṛduktaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ deyameva /
GK16visa10cu:7144: evañca darśitodāharaṇadvaye “jānīmahe” “manye” iti padayorutprekṣāvācakatve taddvaye utprekṣā naiveti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:7145: tatpadadvayābhāve tu dvayoḥ sandehasaṅkara iti ca bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:7148: anyorudāharaṇayorhṛdaye prayasadbhāvasya smaradhāvanasya ca kāraṇarūpasya sādhyasyāpi padmakuḍmalatā śarapatanañca sādhanaṃ yathā parvato 'yaṃ vahnimān dhūmavattvādityādau /
GK16visa10cu:7152: atra svacchānāṃ patitaparihārarūpasāmānyasya jalānāmasitotpale nirasanarūpo viśeṣarūpaḥ sādhanam /
GK16visa10cu:7165: hetumatā kāryeṇa saha hetorabhedenābhidhābhidhānaṃ hetunāmālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7194: asya ca vicchittiviśeṣasya sarvālaṅkāravilakṣaṇatvena sphuraṇātpṛthagalaṅkāratvameva nyāyyam /
GK16visa10cu:7199: he tanvi / yadi kupitāsi tadā karajakṣataṃ vidhāya bhujapāśābhyāmasya nāyakasya kaṇṭhaṃ dṛḍhaṃ badhāna ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7214: vaktumiṣṭasya vastuno niṣedhābhāso 'niṣedhābhiprāyatvena niṣedhābhāsa ākṣepālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7217: vakṣyamāṇasya uktasya vā vaktumiṣṭasya niṣedhābhāsa ityarthaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:7776_1: viṣṇoryasyāṃ tanau jaganti savikāśamayantraṇamāsata tatra tasyāṃ tanau tapodhanasya

GK16visa10cu:7826: tvāṃ haratā karuṇāvimukhena mṛtyunā mama kiṃ na hṛtaṃ vada /

GK16visa10cu:8374: tathā ca bhamājñā cākarṇapūrīkriyatāṃ karṇaṃ pūrayitvā śrūyatāṃ yuddhārthaṃ maurvo vākarṇaparyantaṃ nīyatāmityarthaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:8404: davāyovetyādiniyamagarbhatvena ekavyaktikavittābhiprāyeṇa vā virodho darśita iti vā /

GK16visa10cu:8428: (vi, sa) haṃho dhīreti . mandasyaiva dhairyavattvenākāryanivṛttirūpeṇa sambodhanam /
GK16visa10cu:8435: īdṛśastvamiti virahe me mama pratyaṅgaṃ dāvāgnivad dahasi cet tadā matta unmatto malinātmakaḥ kuṣṇavarṇa eva kuṭilasvabhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8436: vanacaratvena ca lokavyavahārānabhijñaḥ kokilaḥ kiṃ vakṣyate ?
GK16visa10cu:8445: atra dāhe ekasmiṃścandanakṣmābhṛjjanmarūpe kāraṇe satyapi dākṣiṇyādīnāṃ hetvantarāṇāmupādānam /
GK16visa10cu:8459: “śaśī divasadhūsaro galitayauvanā kāminī saro vigatavārijaṃ mukhamanakṣaraṃ svākṛteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8460: prabhūrdhanaparāyaṇaḥ satatadurgataḥ sajjano nṛpāṅganagataḥ khalo manasi sapta śalyāni me” //
GK16visa10cu:8464: ete sapta dhūsaratvaviśiṣṭaśayyādayaḥ sapta manasi śalyānītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8468: evaṃ galitayauvanāyāḥ kāmavattvaṃ kāminyā galitayauvanatvaṃ vā anucitam /
GK16visa10cu:8477: tatra daivādhānadoṣeṇa śocyasya sattvaṃ svādhīnadoṣeṇa śocyasyāsattvam /
GK16visa10cu:8482: sajjanasya durgatatvaṃ tadaiva doṣāt śocyatvena śobhanam /
GK16visa10cu:8483: galitayauvanāyāṃ kāmavattvasya vidheyatvapakṣe vidheyasya tasya prabhordhanaparāyaṇasya dhanaparāyaṇe prabhutvasya vā,
GK16visa10cu:8484: vidheyasya khale nṛpāṅgaṇagatatvasya nṛpāṅgaṇagate khalatvasya vā bidheyasya svādhīnadoṣeṇa śocyatvāda śobhanatvamiti vidheyānāmeva sadasattvam /
GK16visa10cu:8486_0: iha kecidāhuḥ--“śaśiprabhṛtīnāṃ śobhanatvaṃ khalasyāśobhanatvaṃ ceti sadasadyogaḥ”
GK16visa10cu:8486_1: iti anye tu--“śaśiprabhṛtīnāṃ svataḥ śobhanatvaṃ dhūsaratvādīnāṃ tvaśobhanatvamiti sadasadyogaḥ” /
GK16visa10cu:8487: atra hi śaśiprabhṛtiṣu dhūsaratvāderatyantacitatvamiti vicchittiviśeṣasyaiva camatkāravidhāyitvam /
GK16visa10cu:8489: “nṛpāṅganagataḥ khala” iti tu kramabhedādduṣṭatvamāvahati sarvatra viśeṣyasyaiva śobhanatvena prakramāditi /
GK16visa10cu:8491: samādhyalaṅkāre tvekakāryaṃ prati sādhake samagre 'pyanyasya kākatālīyanyāyenāpatanamiti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8494: (vi, kha) pūrvoktaślokepi vidheyānāmeva tathātvād bhinnābhiprāya granthakṛnmanasi kṛtvāparoktaṃ sadasadyogaṃ darśayati---iha keciditi /
GK16visa10cu:8499: uddeśye sattvāsattvābhyāṃ tu teṣāṃ matena camatkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8505: khale nṛpāṅgaṇagatvasya vidheyatā gatatvasya vidheyatāpakṣa eva nṛpāṅgaṇagatade khalatvasya vidhayatā pakṣetūddeśyaḥ śobhana eveti naiṣa doṣa iti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:8506: ekakāraṇādeva sukare kārye daivāt kāraṇāntarā'gamanarūpāt samādhyalaṅkārādasya bhedamāha---iha ca khaleti /
GK16visa10cu:8508: kāryaṃ prati ekasyaiva samagre sādhakatve 'samagrakāraṇavṛttirna sādhakatve ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8511: viśeṣyasya śaśikāminīprabhṛteḥ sūtrasya tṛtīyapādaṃ viśadayati--iha ceti /
GK16visa10cu:8514: “aruṇe ca taruṇi nayane tava malinaṃ ca priyasya mukham /
GK16visa10cu:8515: mukhamānataṃ ca sakhi te jvalitaścāsyāntare smarajvalanaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:8520: (vi, ga) guṇayoḥ kriyayośca yogapadyarūpaṃ samuccayamāha---aruṇe ceti /
GK16visa10cu:8522: tau ca yayoruttarabhūtau tayoryaugapadyabodhakau ityata āhaatrādye iti /

GK16visa10cu:9283: saṃdigdhatve ca bhavati saṅkarastrividhaḥ punaḥ // VisSd_10.98 //
GK16visa10cu:9286: (vi, ṣa) saṅkaraśca trividho bhavatītyāha---aṅgāṅgitve iti alaḍkṛtīnāmaṅgāṅgitve evavidhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9295: yadyapyaṅgāṅgibhāvo janyajanakabhāvaḥ prakṛṣyaprakarṣakabhāvo jñāpyajñāpakabhāvaśceti trividhastathāpi jñāpyajñāpakabhāvarūpamevodāharati /
GK16visa10cu:9302: yasya mandaraparvatasya gadamūle 'dhobhāgarūpamūle eva śleṣaṇa caraṇasya mūle prānte mandākinī aceṣṭata sevārūpāṃ ceṣṭāmakarodityartaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9304: mama patyuramburāśera#manthajanyāyā vyathāyā āśu śīghraṃ vyupaśamāya ityeva tadarthamivetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9305: manthato nivṛttasya tenaiva pūrvaṃ janitā manthavyathā āśu naṃkṣyatītyevaṃrūpā prārthanā /
GK16visa10cu:9306: nanu mandākinī manthanātpūrvamapi mandarasya pādamūle vartate /
GK16visa10cu:9308_0: bhāvaktāntatvād ākarṣaṇavegena vigalan yo rajjubhūtasya bhujagendrasya vāsukerbhogāt
GK16visa10cu:9308_1: kāyānnirmokaścarmakañcukaṃ tadrūpasya paṭṭasya vastraviśeṣasya pariveṣṭanayā udveṣṭanaprakāreṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9310: kintu mandākinyeva paritaḥ pādamūlaṃ sevar#athaṃ veṣṭitavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9313: sā ca mandā kinyā vastuvṛttena yatpādamūlaveṣṭanaṃ taccaraṇamūlaveṣṭanamiti śleṣamutthāpayatīti tasyāṅgam /
GK16visa10cu:9331: iyaṃ tu prakarṣakamaṅgaṃ sevājñānaṃ vinā manthavyathopaśamanārthatāyāḥ veṣṭanamātrasyāsambhavenātprekṣāyāstathā prakarṣaṇaāt /
GK16visa10cu:9350: puraḥ paścādbhāvena sthitayorekadā milarūpasya samāgamasyaiva dṛṣṭatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:9358: ttu yathā-- “pulindāste ripustrīṇāṃ vane hāraṃ haranti no /
GK16visa10cu:9359: bimboṣṭhakāntyā śoṇaṃ taṃ guñjamālāṃ hi manyate //
GK16visa10cu:9370: kīdṛśaṃ santataṃ vistṛtaṃ tamaḥ andhākāram ajñānaṃ ca bhindānamamandanayanānandakaraṃ ca /
GK16visa10cu:9374: athavā idamiti mukhasya candramaṇḍalasya ca dvayorapi prakṛtayorekadharmābhisaṃbandhāttulyayogitā,
GK16visa10cu:9378: yadvā manmathoddīpanaḥ kālaḥ svakāryabhūtacandravarṇanāmukhena vaṇita iti paryāyoktiriti bahūnāmalaṅkarāṇāṃ saṃdehātsaṃdehasaṅkaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9381: (vi, gha) atrālaṅkārāṇāṃ saṃśayakoṭitāṃ darśayati--atreti . idaṃ gagane aindavaṃ maṇḍalamarthānnāyikāyāmābhātītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9383: mukhasyedaṃ padena nirdeśe tu rūpakamityāha uteti /
GK16visa10cu:9385: tathāṃ ca idaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ mukhaṃ gagane aindavaṃ maṇḍalaṃ cābhātītyartaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9388: mukhasyaiva prakrāntatve tadupamānatayaiva candranirdeśe tu tasyāprakṛtatvāt prakṛtāprakṛtayorekadharmānvayarūpaṃ dīpakamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9394: yathā vā--“mukhacandraṃ paśyāmi” ityatra kiṃ mukhaṃ candra iva ityupamā ?
GK16visa10cu:9400: “mukhacandraḥ prakāśate” ityatra prakāśākhyo dharmo rūpakasya sādhako mukhe upacaritatvena saṃbhavatīti nopamābādhakaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9404: mukhacandraṃ cumbatīti mukhasyānukūlaṃ candratulyamukha eva sākṣādanvitamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9410: saca dharmaścandre eva sākṣāstītyato viśeṣyatvena pratīyamāne candre sākṣādanvitatvādrūpakasya sādhaka ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9411: upamāyāstu na bādhaka ityata āhamukhe upacaritatveneti /
GK16visa10cu:9415: atra yoṣita āliṅganaṃ nāyakasya sādṛśye nocitamiti lakṣmyāliṅganasya rājanyāsaṃbhavādupamābādhakam,
GK16visa10cu:9432: cañcalaṃ locanaṃ yatreti vigraheṇa cañcalalocanavattvasyāmbujatulye vadane eva sambhavādupamāyāḥ sādhakatetyāha--atreti /
GK16visa10cu:9434: evaṃ--“sundaraṃ vadanāmbujam” ityādau sādhāraṇadharmaprayoge “upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ sāmānyāprayoge” iti vacanādupamāsamāso na saṃbhavatītyupamāyā bādhakaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9439: sundaraṃ vadanāmbujamityādau sādhāraṇadharmaprayoge upamāsamāso na sambhavatītyatra upamāyā bādhaka ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9444: atrahīti vacanāt sundaraṃ vahanāmbujamiti prayoge upamāsamāse sati na sambhavatītyataḥ sundaratvarūpasādhāraṇadharmāprayoge upamāyā bodha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9446: ityādyārthe vyaṃsakatvādibhāvād yatropamānasya pūrvanirdeśastatraiva mayūravyaṃsakaditvamupamānasya paranirdeśe tu netyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9449: “kaṭākṣeṇāpīṣatkṣaṇamapi nirīkṣeta yadi sā tadānandaḥ sāndraḥ sphurati pihitāśeṣaviṣayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9460: sā nāyikā kṣaṇamarthānmāmīṣadalpaṃ yadi nirīkṣeta tadā pihitāśeṣaviṣayaḥ sāndra ānandaḥ sphurati /
GK16visa10cu:9461: tadā tasyā ambujākṣyāḥ parīrambhārambhaḥ ka iva bhavitā,
GK16visa10cu:9466: saromāñcābhyāmata evodañcadbhyāṃ kucakalaśābhyāṃ nirbhinnaṃ paribhraṣṭaṃ vasanaṃ yatra tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9472: (vi, ña) atra vākyārūpaikāśrayasattvaṃ dvividhānuprāsayordarśayati---atreti chekātuprāso 'nekasya vyañjanasya svarūpataḥ sāmye sati tacchekānuprāsoktatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:9473: saṃyuktānevarṇasya tu ānupūrvyasambhavāttādṛśe 'nekasya kṣakāramātrasya sakṛcchekānuprāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9478: kaṭākṣapātenāpi sāndrandasphuraṇād daṇḍāpūpikayā siddhe stanaparirambhe 'nirvacanīyānanda ityevamarthāpattyalaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9482: yathā vā--“kurabakāravakāraṇatāṃ yayuḥ” ityatra rabakā ravakā ityekaṃ bakāravakāra ityekamiti yamakayoḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9493: tyatrāpi lakalo lakalo kalola kalola iti yamakadvayam /
GK16visa10cu:9504: prasāritaṃ gītaṃ yatreti tādṛśaṃ mayūravṛndānāmānartitakaṃ nṛtyayuktaviśeṣaṇakeṣu divaseṣu mahati pūjyaṃ bhavati śobhate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9507: abhinavapayoda eva rasikā rasavanta eka nṛtyadarśanārthaṃ rasavanto yatra tādṛśeṣu /
GK16visa10cu:9508: tathā pathikāḥ sāmājikā iva nṛtyādididṛkṣisamājapradhānānīva yatra tādṛśeṣu /
GK16visa10cu:9509: atra rasikasāmājikānāṃ samājapradhānatulyānāṃ ca tṛtyadarśināmāśrayatvena divasānāṃ nṛtyasattārūpakaṃ vyaṅgyamavadheyam /
GK16visa10cu:9523: sāhityadarpaṇamamuṃ sudhiyo vilokya sāhityatattvamakhilaṃ sukhameva vitta // VisSd_10.99 //
GK16visa10cu:9530: śrīcandretyādikṛtamamuṃ sāhityadarpaṇaṃ pustakaṃ vilokya akhilaṃ sāhityatattvaṃ sukhameva sukhaviśiṣṭameva yathā syāttathā vitta jānītetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9535: “āḥ kiṃ kampamurīkaroṣi vasudhe dhūrardite vā bhava- drovindena tu nandamandirakṛtakrīḍāvatāreṇa te /
GK16visa10cu:9536: vikhyātaḥ kavirājirāja iti yaḥ śrīviśvanāthaḥ kṛtī tasyākarṇya giraḥ śirāṃsi bhujagādhīśo dhunīte 'dhunā” //
GK16visa10cu:9540: tāvanmanaḥ saṃmadayan kavīnāmeṣa prabandhaḥ prathito 'stu loke // VisSd_10.100 //
GK16visa10cu:9545: tāvatkavīnāṃ manaḥ sammadayannayaṃ prabandho loke prathitostu ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9547: (lo, ṛ) samprati granthasya samāptau svābhīṣṭapūrvakaṃ śubhāśaṃsanaṃ karoti--- yāvaditi /
GK16visa10cu:9548: sammadayan samyak prīṇayan--- āstāmanantakṛtinā kṛta eṣa dhīre- ṇāsādya tātaśaraṇāmburuhaprasādam /
GK16visa10cu:9555: akhilabhāṣaiva vilāsinī nāyikā tasyāḥ bhujaṅgaḥ kāmukastadanuśīlakatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:9556: iti maheśvaratarkālaṅkāraviracitāyāṃ sāhityadarpaṇaṭīkāyāṃ daśamaparicchedavivaraṇam suśliṣṭasaṃskṛtavaśena sukhādhirohā vaiṣamyadustarataraṅgavibhedadakṣā /
